review_text: The whole place seemed to be brand new and very clean. Everything needed for cooking and other amenities were readily available. Plenty of places to visit within walking distance
Very nice house with lots of space.

The house is great, was squeaky clean, comfortable furniture and beds.. Host was very responsive and asked if we needed anything.. Overall it was an awesome place to visit with family and stay... will most definitely stay there again when we come back that way..

Angela was a great host. She was very responsive when I asked a question. The house was very clean with nice decorations and airy!
Thank you Angela for being a great host!

Great place to stay! We stayed here during graduation weekend at D&E. Very convenient location, right next to campus. Great communication from host, very comfortable house for my family of 5. Will definitely stay here again!

Great location. Especially if you are doing anything at D&E College. Walkable to town. Plus great location for easy access to anywhere in town.
Very nice house and yard. House was spotless. We had a lot of fun.
Thanks Angela

Can’t say enough positive things about this house and the host. Clean, comfortable, great location, nicely equipped. It is a wonderful place to stay in Elkins. Clearly a lot of thought and preparation have gone into this property. Would give it more than 5-stars if that was an option. Will certainly stay there again.
Great place. Clean with listed amenities. Close and conveniently located.

Angela’s place was great. It was well equipped with new furnishings and tasteful decor. The kitchen had everything we needed and more. Angela was very helpful and timely in her communication. We would definitely stay again and recommend to others.

What a gift it was to be the first to rent your lovely home! You were all so responsive to the things that are only realized when you are living a place for several days. Everything was beautifully furnished and comfortable. I'd suggest having a shovel nearby in the winter. The one I had in my car came in handy with the beautiful 8 inches of snow we got that weekend! I look forward to returning soon!
The cabin was super cozy and relaxing. The host was also super responsive.
Very peaceful and quiet. We had all the information we needed to check in easily and quickly. Very relaxing weekend.
Loved the cabin, very cozy. Appreciate it being pet friendly. They even had dog bowls setting out for us. I wished the weather would have cooperated so we could have explored the area more.
Great cabin near all amazing hiking spots and very peaceful!
We had a great weekend staying at this cabin and loved all that the area had to offer! The host's guidebook was very helpful and pointed us in the right directions.
We had a wonderful weekend!

What a peaceful little spot in a beautiful area. The house was the perfect amount of space for our group of 2 couples. The cabin feels remote but is still close enough to get to shopping and restaurants. Ashley left a wonderful guide full of suggestions. I will say if you are going with others, 'adult' private time isn't an option. There is no door to the upstairs loft, and you can hear every peep through the ceiling/floor anyway. Still had a great time playing board games, fishing, and relaxing in the hot tub.

Stayed here with a friend to visit some family in the area. Cabin is beautiful, area is safe, and the views are beyond description. Trout is plentiful if you’re looking to fish! Ashley responded quickly, even kindly answering my dumber questions. We loved sitting in the hot tub under the glowing lights after a long hike. We made dinner in the cabin and loved playing the board games Ashley provided. It was a little rainy when we came through, otherwise we would’ve made a fire with the wood Ashley left us. We had a fantastic weekend and plan to come back here!

We loved this stay! Upon entering the place smelled amazing and felt perfectly cozy. Very clean, amenities were great and the hot tub was amazing. Not sure I would say private as it’s on the front porch and there seemed to be some neighbors out, but overall still a peaceful neighborhood. Ashley even had people over in the morning to shovel the front porch and sidewalk during our stay! We would definitely revisit this place. :)
Loved this little cabin!

All in all great stay. We were a party of 4 over the age 60. The spiral staircase was definitely an issue. We had difficulty navigating it but the overall cabin was great. Super clean and smelled wonderful. Overall 5 stars.
Great place to stay at!!

Nice homey cabin. Very clean. Well supplied with linens and towels.
The spiral staircase was very pretty but not made for adults. I had to turn sideways to get to the loft bedroom.
Only real complaint was that both beds had super soft middles. So you constantly were sliding against your sleeping partner.
We had a peaceful Christmas away from home. The location was beautiful and quiet. Ashley was very responsive and helpful during our stay!
Beautiful place secluded by other cabins and an rv park area. The place was extremely clean and smelled amazing as well! Had a great time!
Beautiful cabin, so cozy and comfortable!!! Ashley was so helpful - even gave me snow updates before we arrived!

The host Ashley was very helpful with any questions I had and always got back to me with a response right away! Easy directions that took you right to the cabin and it was very clean and nice inside and out! Great location far enough away from Elkins to be quite but not to far to want to go into town to grab a bite to eat. Highly recommend this cabin!
Great Cabin, and Ashley is a very helpful host.
Very cozy...
Perfect for what I was looking for! The listing was spot on and we enjoyed the stay!

Definitely would recommend this place. There is a lot to do outdoors in the area. The host was quick to respond to questions and cabin was very cozy. You could definitely tell a lot of thought and work went into this rental.

me and my boyfriend went for a quick getaway and we loved it! it was rainy since we got there so we stayed inside watching movies, very cozy. the place was really nice and clean with a very quiet neighborhood.

This place is a definite hidden gem. I plan on making return trips here. We have the most amazing stay in this little cabin. The surroundings are so peaceful and just breathtaking. Ashley, is an amazing host and so receptive and quick to answer messages. If you are looking for some peace and quiet, this is your place. Most of the tourist stuff was closed when we were here so im not going to be very helpful with local stuff to do. We had plenty of stuff to see and enjoy though. I would highly recommend this place to anyone!!

Ashley was amazing! She took care of us right away and was very accommodating to our needs! The cabin and community was beautiful. Nothing could beat enjoying the hot tub at night while listening to the river! We will be back to visit again!
Great stay! No issues finding the place or getting in, and had everything we needed. Hot tub was a much needed bonus after a long drive.
Great place to stay. We had 2 little ones and it worked out wonderful.
Very nice place! I loved the turkey on top of the refrigerator, it scared my girlfriend at first, overall very nice cozy place!
Perfect little weekend getaway!
The cabin was clean, spacious, and had everything we needed. Loved being able to come back and enjoy the hot tub after a full day of hiking.
Beautiful location, nice place to relax after exploring all the surrounding area has to offer. Very clean and comfortable. Would stay again!
Thanks for the stay!

This place was perfect for a weekend get away. It looks exactly like the pictures, it’s quiet and a peaceful area. It put us in the perfect location for all of the hiking destinations we had on our list, such as Seneca rocks and blackwater falls. It was easy to find the cabin and was stocked with everything we needed. We will be back! It was perfect.
We really enjoyed our stay! Was very homey and felt safe in the area! Cabin was stocked with everything we needed for our weekend stay! Would definitely return or recommend!!
This cabin was perfect for our fall getaway. Cozy and comfortable. We loved exploring the surrounding area
Great place! Exceeded expectations!

We loved our stay at creekside cabin. The place was very clean and well decorated. It was nice having a washer and dryer and clean linens so we could pack less. Nice location, only about 15 minutes to gas stations, grocery stores and restaurants. Loved the hot tub and outdoor fire pit. One thing I will say is that this place is not very childproof. There are small things for children to get into, my son accidentally broke a coaster set but Ashley was very understanding. One door doesn’t lock from the inside so we had to place a table in front of it so our two year old did not get out while we slept. The internet was very slow which sucked, coming here was out of state for us and our phones didn’t work at all. Also the tvs couldn’t load so we could only watch tv on the main tv. Overall we loved our stay and would recommend it. Would love to come back again.

Excellent stay! Located in the peaceful valley along the Shavers Fork. Beautiful, well decorated, fully supplied, and comfortable. This was perfect for our much needed relaxing escape. It was like home away from home. We could have (and should have) stayed longer!
My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our 3 night stay in the cabin! The location was perfect and the amenities were great. We felt like we were right at home and would highly recommend!
Great place! Enjoyed my time!
Neat, clean little cabin. Perfect for our family
Everything was great. Ashley was a great host. She answered within seconds. The cabin was very homey and peaceful. Great spot to visit. Everyone was very friendly.

overall cabin was a beautiful stay. everything was clean and the amenities were wonderful. it was a little hard to locate and is not as private as it seems to be on the listing. it is smack dab in the middle of a giant campground, but everyone was super friendly and Ashley was very responsive. would definitely stay again

very nice and clean
centrally located to popular attractions.
Na

Close to two of my favorite hikes, Seneca Rocks and Chimney Top. Jacuzzi was great after a day of hiking. Kroger nearby for groceries is convenient. Had an overall great, relaxing stay at the cabin, would visit again!
The cabin was clean and well stocked with kitchen supplies and clean towels and linen. The welcome binder was helpful and Ashley was easy to get a hold of!
Loved the cabin! Was perfect for what my family needed to explore WV and have a safe, clean place to stay at for the weekend.
great little retreat. I recommend for everyone. thank you Ashley we had a good time !

This cabin is beautiful! I have no complaints whatsoever. This was my first time using an Airbnb and I couldn’t have been more pleased. Ashley is quick to respond and very helpful for anything I needed. She is professional and also kind. She has all the pamphlets of all the fun activities you can do in the surrounding area right on the table when you walk in and a binder with clear instructions for your stay. 10/10 recommend!
Not a complaint, but the stairs up to the loft are a little scary having toddlers and hard to keep them off of them. We put one of our bags in front of the staircase to prevent my 1 and 2 year old from climbing them. It at least slowed them down. Haha

We loved the area. The mountain views are beautiful and it was so nice and peaceful. We liked that the river was so close and it's an easy walk to. The porch and hot tub were so relaxing in the evenings. And we thought the cabin was very clean and just the right space for our family. We loved our stay!

We stayed for the weekend to celebrate our anniversary and we wasn’t disappointed. We pulled up and there was a ground hog and ducks hanging out in the yard, so nice and peaceful. Very clean place, ashley was quick to respond to my question. Would stay again.

The cabin was really nice and we had a good time. The only thing I could suggest is to disclose more detail about the stairs going to the loft . As a 60 year old who is in good shape I had no problem using the staircase, I could see it being a problem for a bigger person getting up there. Other then that the place is great!

Ashley was an excellent host that went above and beyond. The property was beautiful and relaxing. We loved how clean everything felt and quiet the area was. We even accidentally left some articles of clothing and Ashley promptly contacted us and even offered to send them back to us, amazing hospitality. We would stay hear again in a heartbeat.
Beautiful cabin right next to the shavers. Was a nice getaway for our family. We will definitely be back!
The cabin was perfect and the location was beautiful ! So relaxing and enjoyable! Wonderful and accommodating host!
Great stay! The cabin was very well taken care of and exactly what I was looking for. Conveniently located to Elkins.
Nice cozy cabin. We enjoyed our stay!
Beautiful get away. Will look forward to visiting again

Ashley is a wonderful host, very friendly and gave us a wonderful recommendation for a place to have breakfast. The cabin is super clean. Seems like it was recently renovated and it has everything you could ask for in an Airbnb.
I have three issues - two of them are small.
At night, we couldn't find street addresses ; ended up guessing. (Guessed wrong the first time!)
The impression you get from the lead photo is that you are off in the woods. Not so. There are old buildings around it, many camping trailers, and railroad tracks right behind the house. Not sure if they are active; we did not hear a train.
The third issue is the circular staircase to the upper bed. I wouldn't let kids use it. Neither my wife or I could without banging our heads or squeezing and awkwardly twisting our bodies. There is something odd about the way it's built right next to the beam.
Great cabin for two people (maybe one more on the couch) and a dog, but not more than that.
We loved the Cabin and the location! Ashley was beyond amazing, answered all our questions quickly and sent us information about things happening around us.

Definitely a nice place to stay! You are close to neighbors and campsites but it was still very quiet for us. Clean and cozy ,it was a perfect weekend getaway for 2 people. Ashley was very responsive and helpful

the host is lovely, great response time. i didn’t expect the location to be close to train tracks and a trailer park area but it was surprisingly very quit. we got snowed in one day and had to book for another night, the host worked it out for us very smoothly. they also helped us out with getting food/any supplies we needed while we were snowed in. make sure to bring fwd if you are coming in the winter!

We had a very relaxing weekend at this cabin. We used the hot tub and grill. The cabin was clean, comfortable and well appointed. Host communicated well to try to avoid difficulty in finding the cabin and proactively messaged regarding possible difficulties with the snow. Overall great experience.

Perfect spot for a last minute stay when we needed it and were passing through the area with our dog. Could not have asked for a cleaner cabin. Love this area having traveled the area roads yearly on a regular summer motorcycle trip. Beautiful area and plenty of outdoor stuff to see and do. Would definitely stay again. Oh and the bed was SUPER COMFY TOO!!!
Loved this place! We had such a great weekend. Beautiful area, the campground was adorable. Highly recommend for a little weekend getaway.
A nice, clean cozy cabin to stay for the weekend for our Elkins Winter Excursion train ride. If the opportunity arises again, we will go back.
Second time staying at this cabin and enjoyed it just as much as the first time.
Ashley was a fantastic host! We had a great stay and everything was as described if not better! I highly recommend her place, it was perfect for my husband, son and me.
We had an amazing weekend get away . Peaceful , quiet, and relaxing . Would definitely recommend.

This place is gorgeous! It’s rustic and comfortable - and SPOTLESS. The cleanest place we’ve ever stayed. My boyfriend was blown away - he called it perfect (and he’s hard to please!). Ashley was so sweet and easy to communicate with. Virtually immediate responses. I can’t say enough great things about this place. We walked in and felt completely COMFORTABLE. We are already talking about when we can plan to come back.
Ashley was a great and responsive host. She thoroughly answered all of my questions and concerns in a timely manner, which made the stay more comfortable.

My wife, two friends and I used Ashley's place as our home base for a weekend snowboarding trip. The cabin was exactly as described and worked perfectly for us. The place was warm, clean and comfortable with all the basic amenities - and as a bonus the hot tub worked, which proved to be a great way to unwind after a day on the slopes. would definitely stay here again!
Thank you for everything. Your place is awesome. We would love to come back.

Ashley was very responsive and understanding with our particular situation. The cabin was beautiful and cozy, even better in person. Everything was clean and organized. The hot tub worked well and was the perfect ending after a long day of winter sports. Excellent location for a romantic or skiing getaway. I 1000% recommend staying here and Ashley as a host.
Great place with nice views. Close to multiple trails and lookout towers.
Gorgeous cabin in the mountains!!!
Such a great place. We will definitely plan to stay again.
Cute and comfortable cabin in a beautiful location. Highly recommend!

We stayed here during the winter storm Elliot and over Christmas. Any issues we had because of the storm they came out to take care of day of. They were very friendly, handy, and kind. We would absolutely stay here again. All issues we encountered were only because of the storm, not because of the cabin itself.
Nice spot, hot tub is clutch and place was super clean. Thanks !

Ashley's cabin is a perfect place for a weekend getaway to WV! We loved the bear and deer decor! The cabin is very cool and perfectly spacious for 2 people. She provided everything we needed for our weekend stay. Her cabin is a close 12 minute drive into the town of Elkins. The check-in and check-out process was very easy and Ashley responded quickly to any questions I had regarding our stay. The hot tub is such a nice addition!
Very clean, adorable cabin! Had a great nights stay here!
We had an awesome time. Beautiful, house had board games, peaceful, I could go on and on. Would 100% recommend!

Nice clean and cozy cabin. Short distance to town with many good spots to shop and eat. Also close to many hiking trails. Even with a tropical storm the one night, we enjoyed hanging out inside. wifi/smart TV in bedroom was a nice touch! Very easy to find the cabin and check in. Host was friendly and communicated well.
Very nice place for a weekend getaway! Just a short drive into town and the hot tub was really nice. Would be interested in coming back.
Excellent

We really enjoyed our stay at this little cabin. Everything was super clean, the kitchen was well stocked, the wifi worked great and there was a beautiful river a short walk away. The beds were very comfortable and the decor had a lot of charm. Host communicated well and answered questions promptly. Check in was easy too. Quiet location and a lovely stay!
It was very cozy and would definitely stay again.
Cozy cabin in a great location!
We had a great time at Creekside. The main living area of the cabin was spacious and comfortable. The kitchen was very well stocked. The entire place was very clean.

This is a cute, clean, cozy cabin. The staircase up to loft is extremely narrow/tight, so we were lucky the friend who had been planning to stay with us backed out - we were in town for a Strongman competition and there’s a good chance he would have gotten stuck going upstairs! It was really miserably rainy due to Hurricane Ian, so we actually left a full day early since weather was much better at home.
Great Place to stay at, lots of scenery. Would recommend to anyone taking a weekend trip in the woods!

As several other reviewers mentioned, this isn’t a secluded cabin. However it is very quiet. You can hear the river from the porch, the ducks quacking in the creek and occasionally kids playing. We enjoyed our stay immensely. The hot tub was a great bonus. We would recommend this cabin to anyone planning to stay in the area.

He is very friendly. I asked many questions while stayed, and he answered very kindly all the times. I definitely recommend this place. Hot tubs water is also very clean. It was great experience for us. But internet wifi isn’t working well when it’s raining outside.
My daughter and I had a wonderful time. The cabin was perfect, with everything we could possibly need. It was also very clean. We loved the peace and quiet of the area.
A wonderful, mountainous get away! The cabin is quaint and cozy. It is located in the perfect spot. Ashley was a great host! I’d recommend staying here, it’s a great experience.

Stayed for a few days as we dropped our daughter off at Davis and Elkins College. A great location. Close enough to town for conveniences yet far enough away to enjoy walks and take in the beautiful nature.
Everything was very clean! Had all the basic amenities. Outside chairs and tables allowed for relaxing nights on the deck. Very generous with extra pillows and blankets. Ashley was great and easily reached and responsive. A wonderful place to stay. We will be back!

This cabin was very clean. Located in a camp ground which was cool. Wish the river wasn’t so rough because we wanted to go tubing. Quit place. Relaxing. Enjoyed very much. Ashley responded quickly when mentioned.
Great place. We will be back again.
This cabin was so nice, we loved our stay. It was the perfect cabin for our girls weekend away.
Place was perfect, everything was clean and Ashley was a great host. I didn’t want to leave this cute cabin. 😍
Fun, cozy cabin tucked into the Mountains.

Ashley’s place was amazing. The people at the campground were respectful. The lady at the little store was very knowledgeable and helped me and my brothers get everything we needed to go fishing. The hot tub is such a additional bonus. I would definitely recommend.

House was very clean. There were plenty of bath towels and wash clothes, extra garbage bags, toilet paper, bounty towels etc. It was a cozy home and we enjoyed our stay. We loved the hot tub in the mornings when there was fog on the mountains.
Exactly what we were looking for!!! The cabin was super cute, clean, and a perfect weekend getaway. Thanks again Ashley!!! :)
Cute little cabin. Hot tub was great.

Absolutely loved our stay at the cabin! It’s beautifully decorated and very comfortable. The hot tub was amazing! It was a short drive to the city of Elkins and very close to lots of hiking. We were able to bring our dogs with us and they loved it too.
Great little cabin for a weekend getaway!

This was an excellent cabin!! Really well cared for and the host were responsive and timely even in a snow storm. The cabin is right next to a river for fishing and also an excellent central location for many great hikes and excursions in the area!!

Everything was great, very clean and updated. Located a stones throw away from the river, inside of a quiet campground. Wasn’t a deal breaker but the one negative for me was the pictures in the listing made me feel that it would be very private but there are two cabins located directly to the left and right. Definitely will stay here again, Thanks Ashley.

Great little cabin. Very compact and was just enough for our family of three. We had a lovely stay.
The property is a little less secluded than I thought from the pictures (it’s across the road from an RV park). But in the winter it was quiet and still felt very private. Host was very helpful and communicative. They came to plow, shovel and salt when we got some snow.
A great, cozy little cabin! Kitchen was well stocked with all we needed to be able to cook/eat. The hot tub was perfect after playing in the snow all day!

This was the best cabin I’ve ever stayed at (and I’ve stayed at quite a few). Perfect for a weekend getaway. Ashley was one of the best hosts I’ve experienced with Airbnb. The cabin was flawless- clean, comfortable, great location. I would stay again in a heartbeat!
We loved our stay! The cabin was so cute and had everything we needed for a comfortable and fun getaway! Would recommend to any skiers that want a private place to return after a day on the slopes.

the place was so comfortable and pretty! my boyfriend and I absolutely loved our stay. it was a great place to just relax and go exploring! ashley was also just so sweet and answered any of our question. thank you again! we will definitely be back!!
Great cabin! Hoping to go back during a time when we can experience the full outdoors! Cabin was perfect, and host was too!
Nice cabin to satay
Quiet place to relax. Very clean. Great value.
The cabin really is cute and cozy. While the interior was warm and inviting, our favorite part was hanging out in the hot tub under a thousand stars. The hosts were very responsive and kind as well.
This cabin was perfect for our girls trip! Try to arrive during the day in case you don’t have service and make sure to salt the stairs in the winter 😊
Terrific place. Would definitely go back!
This place is very clean and has everything. Linens, coffee pot, propane for the grill, kitchen ware. It's beautiful there and we loved it. I'm certain we will be staying again.

If you are thinking of booking a room here - you should do it immediately! I could write a book about how wonderful our short stay was. The house is welcoming and filled with a wonderful historic and artistic energy. The space is clean, cared for, and guests' comfort has been prioritised with every detail thought of ahead of time.
To say our hosts, Alice and Joe, went above and beyond doesn't quite describe it. We enjoyed talking with them over farm fresh eggs and coffee, and enjoying some wine on the vast deck sheltered from the rain. We definitely have new friends in Elkins now.
You are centrally located to all the restaurants and attractions of Elkins all walkable, we recommend the train ride.
It was a great stay, and the host Alice is very accommodating.
Had a fantastic stay with Alice, her and her husband were friendly and very hospitable and their home was beautiful. would stay with them again.

Alice and Joe were wonderful hosts! They were incredibly friendly and made my stay very comfortable. I was the only guest, but the shared spaces were very clean and it wouldn't be an issue sharing them with other guests. The location is very convenient. I would definitely recommend staying in their beautiful old home if you're visiting Elkins!

2nd time staying. This time Alice went above & beyond as I was working night shift at the hospital & needed to sleep during the day. She made check in/check out flexible & was quiet & respectful knowing I was sleeping during the day.
Great communication, easy to find, easy check in
Always a pleasure to see Alice and Joe! I’ve lost track of how many times I’ve been a guest at their lovely home, and I’ll be be back again ☺️

Alice-Gervais was an excellent and very welcoming host. In the midst of Elkin's annual Forest Festival, she provided a convenient downtown location and even provided extra services to give us parking in the busy downtown setting. And when I returned after a busy day, I'd find myself welcomed to join the community on the front porch which included the Airbnb guests and other neighbors. It all made for a great visit to Elkins.

Alice-Gervias and Joe are incredible hosts!! Their home is beautiful and worth the stay just for a tour of the dwelling.
It is in walking distance to Elkin's downtown and all it has to offer. There is also a fantastic Venezuelan restaurant just a few doors down.
I would highly recommend staying here. One of the top Airbnb's I've stayed at.

It's always a pleasure to stay with Alice. This house is in a perfect location that's walkable to everywhere downtown and onto campus. The home is full of creative and welcoming energy as well as good conversation. Highly recommend.

This charming place was a great find! I felt at home the minute I arrived. Alice and Joe are wonderful hosts and know how to make guests feel welcome. Everything was very clean and comfortable, including the bed and shared kitchen. An exceptionally large, airy, and shaded front porch offers a great space to hang out, have coffee (provided by hosts), and talk or read. (There is also a lovely shaded garden in the backyard.) The historic house is architecturally grand with wonderful character and details, including artwork, and is conveniently located downtown (walking distance to Davis & Elkins college). At the price, it was also a great value. Hope to come back sometime!
Wonderful, wonderful wonderful on every level! Love their home and love them! Highly recommended ✨

I stayed with Alice Gervais for seven nights while at a meeting in Elkins, and I would stay again without question. My colleagues staying in (and paying more for) hotels were jealous! Alice and her husband treated me like part of their family, but were respectful and left me alone when I wanted. Her home is so full of character and artwork! My room was large and comfortable, and I had the use of the whole house, including the kitchen and half of the refrigerator. They told me the bathroom was shared, but I never encountered anyone else using it, all week long. I used a work area in the room and downstairs in the dining area, but the nicest work area was out on the huge, airy, front porch. The WiFi was speedy, and Alice is a coffee aficionado -- a bonus for sure! Davis and Elkins College and downtown (restaurants, stores, etc.) are both within easy walking distance, although the street is leafy and quiet. Alice Gervais gets five stars from me!

I had a wonderful stay with Alice and Joe. I grew up in the area and was visiting with family. They provided a much needed quiet and friendly space. Beautiful home and location is perfect for downtown Elkins amenities.

Alice was very knowledgeable of the area. I was in the area for a rescue class and didn't have much free time and was on a tight schedule, so Alice made sure I had food and coffee. The place was gorgeous and artsy and so clean. It just seemed to be the perfect place for me, and it certainly helped knowing her and I had so much in common. I definitely look forward in going back when in the area again!

I spent five nights at Alice’s lovely old Victorian house. The house itself has great character and charm and has many interesting artistic touches, as well as antique furniture and other features that I particularly enjoyed looking at. My room was nicely decorated and had a comfy queen sized bed with soft ironed sheets. Cleanliness is an obvious high priority for Alice, as everything was spotless. Alice was very friendly and helpful and we had nice chats together. I slept very well there and was delighted at how quiet the neighborhood was for being in a town. I look forward to staying at Alice’s again the next time I come to Elkins!
Joe and Alice were the perfect hosts! Their home is comfortable, clean, full of character and their kitchen was fantastic. Whenever I’m Elkins you can be sure I will stay here.

What a stay! Cool house and great hosts! Thank you Alice and Joe! And Joe extra thanks for the tour and great conversation about music, the state of the world and the how the creation of the airplane uniquely effected West Virginia!!!
Great spot for a quick work trip to Elkins. Walking distance to downtown Elkins where there's a great coffee shop with a co-working space. Host was friendly and hospitable.
Super comfy bed, I slept great. Very relaxed and cozy environment. I felt very welcomed and safe.
Awesome stay! Excellent host! They were very accomodating for my short notice booking.

Had a fantastic stay at Alice-Gervais's beautiful historic home. The house and room were immaculately clean. The room was very large, comfortable, and had everything I needed. I made use of the kitchen and Alice-Gervais provided coffee each morning. Wonderful location in downtown Elkins and an easy walk to many restaurants and bars. Alice-Gervais is a pleasure to talk to and a wonderful host. Hope to stay again on my next trip to Elkins! Highly recommend.

Great location and charming accommodations.
Hosts responded quickly to an issue. Obviously unexpected. Hence the 4 star, but shouldn’t be held against the hosts nor the accommodations.
Alice is a very sweet lady, I had a nice stay.
Just a great place to stay. Perfect location, very comfortable room. Coffee with the hosts each morning. Lots of great information on the Elkins area. I look forward to staying there again.

Alice and Joe are so amazing coffee first thing in the morning always making sure everything is going ok and your comfortable or need anything the kitchen is the hub so lovely to cook on the amazing stove. The bed was very comfortable. The house is located in town within easy walking distance to cafés, restaurants and stores. I highly recommend staying in this wonderful house it’s a great experience I will be back!

I really enjoyed my stay in Alice-Gervais’s lovely and very cool Victorian home. The room (and bed) was very comfortable and the house was within walking distance to downtown, restaurants etc. Alice is also a wealth of information about the area. I highly recommend this Airbnb.

My wife and I highly recommend this wonderful historic home in the heart of Elkins! From the expansive front porch, to the beautiful interior, and chefs kitchen, this was a great place to stay. It's within walking distance of great restaurants, parks, historical sites, and plenty of fun shops downtown and in the restored railroad district. Just two doors away is an awesome Venezuelan restaurant which also hosts live music several times a week. Our host Alice-Gervais and her husband Joe made us feel welcome and comfortable and I really enjoyed their knowledge of the local history, culture of Elkins.
The house was lovely, rooms were clean and Alice is a wonderful host. highly recommend booking if you'll be in the Elkins area!

I stayed in Alice-Gervais and Joe's home with my partner and two friends and couldn't recommend it more highly. The home is beautiful and artistic—one of the most atmospheric places I've stayed in. Alice and Joe are really generous and accommodating hosts, who made us feel totally at home even though we booked last minute and arrived somewhat late. They are genuinely kind and hospitable people, who went out of their way to make us feel welcome and comfortable even though we made up a somewhat motley crowd! They let us to cook dinner in their kitchen, and use their charmed outdoor spaces; they had also done the bedrooms up really beautifully, and everything was clean and perfect. I would really recommend this Airbnb, and hope to come back myself some day.
Lovely room in historic home 2 blocks from downtown shops, gourmet coffee, artists' gallery, and more. Host Alice is charming and her pear tart delicious. A relaxing, nurturing experience.
Beautiful home and amazing hosts

Alice was a phenomenal host, very social and accommodating. The room was comfortable, house had a lot of character and was decorated with several of her original artworks. Alice offered basics for breakfast and also included me in her family dinners, going well beyond the hospitality I had expected. I would be happy to visit this location again.

Alice's house is gorgeous and an easy walk to Elkins's main street. The house is decorated with an eclectic yet consistent aesthetic that really does reflect its history, and the room was clean and cozy, and stayed warm even when it was well below freezing outside.
Alice is incredibly friendly and communicative, and was able to work with me to arrange a stay on very short notice.
Highly recommend.

This was an absolutely wonderful experience! Alice was a lovely host. She is very welcoming and thoughtful and made me and my dog feel so welcome for our stay. It was a lovely stay and I can’t recommend it highly enough.
Quaint, historic setting. We enjoyed our visit.

What an awesome experience staying at Alice-Gervais’ place. The place is clean and cozy, and the host is friendly, attentive, and extremely cordial. She even baked us a pie as a gift for our visit! Definitely one of the best experience and highly recommend this place to everyone!

What a great stay and great host! They should definitely ask more money for this place, it’s so worth it! It’s a beautiful and artistic house with a lot of history and the couple gave good recommendations for restaurants and hiking areas :). We felt very comfortable and would definitely stay longer if it would have been possible. We got a warm welcome with even delicious (birthday)cake! Besides, Elkins is a good starting point for hikes and sightseeing in the area.
I stayed with my husband and brother (27-30 years old) and we would definitely recommend it to both young and older people, way better than a hotel nearby. Thanks!!

I couldn’t recommend this place more! Alice’s home is so full of life! So much warmth and love in the space, beautifully creative, a home away from home. Her stories and paintings are amazing, so is the orchard in the backyard! Incredibly comfortable bed! I had beautiful dreams. The house has had many lives! It was a gift to pass through.

Really enjoyed staying at Katherine’s place in Elkins — very responsive host and fantastic apartment short walking distance to coffee shop and brewery. Parking was very easy to find next to unit. Very clean and well appointed apartment and would happily stay again!
Amazing place to stay at. Beautiful cabin amazing hot tub!
cute little cabin loved the decor
It is a great cabin! We loved the coyote buddy! Close to lots of outdoor activities.

we had such a great time here. the hot tub was amazing and the location was very peaceful. Beautiful scenery. we loved our stay and our host was always available and very proactive with anything we asked or needed.
great time and excellent location
Perfect location and very cozy! Would highly recommend and would book again. 10/10!

My husband and I had a wonderful weekend honeymoon at this cabin! So peaceful with amazing views. Very clean and well taken care of. There’s lots to do in the surrounding areas and Ashley’s guidebook is incredible. We can’t wait to come back and explore more. We really enjoyed the hot tub while soaking in the view of the snowy mountains! I absolutely recommend!
Wonderful getaway for my family, it was very comfortable and homey. We cooked every meal and the kitchen had everything we needed. the Hot tub felt great and we scenery was beautiful!
Wonderful cabin! Great location especially if you’re looking to hop between towns.
The cabin is cozy and clean! It’s in a convenient location, close to everything the area has to offer. Ashley thought of everything and has everything you’d need in the cabin.
The cabin was great to stay at. We really enjoyed ourselves and all the amenities!! Would highly recommend!
Cute cabin :) … would def stay again!
This was a nice place. We felt welcomed the host was very nice and respectful and helpful. %100 recommend.

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Eagles Nest Cabin! We felt right at home as it is so cozy. The firepit area and hot tub are a huge bonus that added to our relaxing trip! The communication was always quick and helpful. Highly recommend!

This cabin is amazing for people and pets. The hot tub, fire pit and yards are secluded and family friendly.
Our trip included 5-6” of snowfall and a power outage. Thankfully this host has her stuff together and communications were on point to get service restored after/during the storm.
Definitely a repeatable cabin to visit!
Cute little cabin off in the woods. Perfect for what we needed
We really enjoyed the cabin, the peaceful seclusion, proximity to town, and most importantly the hot tub! We would definitely recommend!

Had an amazing time at this cabin! We came for an early Valentine’s Day getaway! Super quiet, private, but yet close enough to things to do! We will def be back!! Very clean and cozy! Loved the hot tub, and fire pit! 10/10 recommend!

Peaceful setting, pet friendly, & responsive. You’ll definitely need 4WD to get out of the drive in the snow. E-mails, texts, streaming up to par. Phone calls hit or miss, a lot of dropped calls. Great place to disconnect and unwind.

Very nice cabin retreat. Limited cell phone reception and limited WiFi, but not an issue when looking to get away to the mountains. Arrived during a storm with no power and the cabin already had a generator and power going, great hospitality. Definitely recommend AWD or 4WD if going during snow season, weather is vastly different from the valleys to mountain tops. Very clean cabin and peaceful surroundings. Definitely will be returning.

This place was perfect for us and our dog. Very cozy cabin that is secluded. We really enjoyed the hot tub and views from the back deck. Highly recommend staying here. 30 mins from timberline ski resort which was a bonus for us.

My partner and I recently spent two wonderful days at this Airbnb in Elkins, WV, and we wanted to express our sincere appreciation for our stay. The cabin itself is absolutely beautiful and provided a very comfortable experience. Ashley, our Airbnb host, was incredibly attentive and responded promptly to any needs we had. I wholeheartedly recommend both Ashley as a host and this delightful cabin. I'm hopeful for the opportunity to stay there again in the future.

This cabin was great. Starting with Ashley, the communication was always fast. The check in was easy. The pictures matched the actual cabin. It is actually perched on a small overlook so it is very private; if you drive in through the campsite area, go up the small hill and it is on the right. Cabin is very clean, and all amenities listed are there. Plenty of pots and pans for our family of four to cook with. We enjoyed the hot tub but it appears a few of the jets do not function. I appreciate that all four of us could take hot showers after being out in the cold, and we never ran out of hot water.
The one downside is the fireplace is electric and not gas or natural. But I understand why due to the location. WiFi was good, certainly adequate for kids and I was able to send/receive work emails.
All in all it is a great cabin. Super easy five star review - everyone in the family feels that way too.
We had a great winter vacation! We are from Florida so we loved the snow. The cabin is in a great location. My family and I enjoyed our time in Elkins.

Took the whole family and everyone was charmed by this beautiful cabin. Cozy but still spacious. Full kitchen, hot tub, fire pit— we never ran out of things to do during our 3 night stay. Check out Blackwater Falls and their gift shop, weather and time permitting!
Ashley was the best host!

I got to Ashley’s place, which was exactly how it was described in the listing. It was clean, very pretty decorated and overall very nice. Due to a personal issue once I arrived I didn’t get to stay and Ashley was very understanding and accommodating.
I would recommend this cabin. Ashley was responsive and very sweet!

Lovely stay, perfect mountain cabin getaway. Very cozy, well furnished, and equipped with everything one could ask for, including a large hot tub and fire pit.
Wifi connection was a bit spotty though (but we came here to unplug, so it wasn't too big a deal for us, just be prepared).
Location is great, right at the edge of the Monongahela National Forrest and a short drive from the nearby town of Elkins, and with tons of scenic trails and hiking spots within 20minutes in all directions.
And while the cabin is fairly secluded (no immediate neighbors) it did feel a little exposed at times, especially on the upper deck with the hot tub overlooking an RV campground and adjacent the quiet road you take to get there (note that we were there in peak winter so the trees were totally barren, could see it feeling more secluded in other seasons with cover).
All around great stay and Ashley was a great host, and highly responsive and helpful whenever we had questions.
Highly recommended!

Ashley's cabin was the perfect place for my girls and I to have a peaceful, rejuvenating weekend retreat! We loved the holiday decor and cozy feeling the moment we stepped inside the cabin. Beautiful surrounding areas, everything was as expected and more. Thank you for sharing this gorgeous space with us!
I took my family and dogs with us! Cabin is beautiful! We all loved it!! Ashley answered my questions quickly! We had a very nice thanksgiving together as a family!!

My friends and I booked this cabin for a girls trip and it was the perfect setting for a quick getaway! The surrounding nature is beautiful and the hot tub was the highlight of our weekend. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a cozy cabin stay!
Well-located, well-equipped, and clean AirBnb within an hour or so of most of the best hikes in Monongahela. Easy arrival and check-in and a quick drive to groceries and other amenities in Elkins.
Wonderful stay. Close to Elkins. Nice and secluded. House was clean. Hot tub was awesome. 10/10 will return. Thank you!

Ashley’s cabin was just what my husband and I needed for a weekend getaway! It was peaceful, quiet, the hot tub and fire pit were amazing additions! Her cabin was by far the cleanest cabin we’ve ever stayed. Pictures don’t do it justice. When one thinks of a cabin you expect some cob webs, dirt, not here! Her place was in pristine condition! She gave great recommendations and had excellent communication. Can’t wait to come back!

A wonderful place, great location. The cabin was very relaxing.
We definitely will book with Ashley again!!
Beautiful little cabin. Would definitely stay again. Loved the hot tub
As listed. Very nice cabin. Would recommend to others and stay again as well.
Beautiful property, amenities in excellent condition, and very comfortable.
Please was perfect

I've stayed in a lot of cabins and I think this was my favorite. It was super cute and clean and in a wonderful area. Everything is set up so well and it makes you feel very cozy. I would stay here again and recommend it to others. The host was kind and easy to communicate with.

Eagles Nest was exactly as described and perfect for an anniversary get away for my husband and I. We came to the area to hike all over from blackwater falls, chimney top, and Seneca rocks. Perfect location. Ashley had set out many recommendations and we really enjoyed smoke on the water for dinner and Big Timber brewing company for drinks and entertainment. The hot tub was a nice 15 minute break from the hiking and the outside firepit area was beautiful with the lighting and is very private. Highly recommend, and would come back!

Everything about the cabin was wonderful! Beautifully decorated and Very clean! We walked around all weekend barefoot and never got our feet dirty ...lol Kitchen was very well stocked with quality pots and pans (not the cheap thin ones most Airbnb have) Ashley was even gracious enough to allow us to enter early when we arrived a half hour before check in. Would highly recommend 🙂

Ashley was amazing throughout the whole process.
Internet isn’t stable so don’t think you can work or anything there even with their wifi.
The place is absolutely stunning and the hot tub on the back deck was a nice touch! Wish I used it more
The cabin was wonderful, we had a great time at the cabin!
Amazing!! Beautiful place that felt like home. Ashley was wonderful. 10 out of 10 would recommend.
This place is wonderful , private and relaxing. It seems like it’s in the middle of nowhere but close to stores and restaurants. Had a great stay!
the place was amazing. we had an extremely good time. would definitely go back.
Great place to relax. Host very responsive. Clean place. Large hot tub. Close to town. Very clean. Has everything you need. We plan on going back in the spring.
We absolutely loved our stay here! Thanks for everything Ashley!
Great little place!
Loved the place! Everything we wanted and great location! Ashley communicated great with me.
Nice place to stay a couple days!

Ashley was a great host and very responsive. When we got to the place it was a little smaller then we had expected but plenty of room to sit and relax on the ground floor. There was only one "True" enclosed bedroom with a door and walls. The other beds were out in the open on the top floor and in both rooms the beds basically were the entire space with minimal space for anything else. Other then the internet not working what so ever (After inspecting the router and internet speeds we found the speed tests were rather poor I assume due to being on a low bandwidth plan) When more then one device was connected everything came grinding to a halt. That being said, we came for a weekend away from everything so I do not knock the entire stay on that one flaw besides not being able to stream music when playing games and relaxing in the hot tub. The place was a bit tricky to find as I went right by it the first time and had to loop back. Overall would rate highly!
Ashley was exactly what I look for in a host. The cabin was a perfect secluded getaway for the weekend.

Great cabin for a weekend fishing trip. Good location, clean rooms, and a well stocked kitchen.
Only issue - internet was very slow. So don’t plan on working remotely during your stay.
Would stay again.

The cabin was as desribed and clean. The hot tub was hot and clean upon arrival. Checkin was so simple and Ashley was phenomenal at communicating. We loved our stay at her cabin and would definitely rent there again if ever back in the area.
Pretty great spot to getaway and have fun. Ashley was very nice and reaponded fast!!!

The reviews help me decide whether to rent a place or not. That being said, I'm surprised previous guests didn't note certain things. 1) This house is on the side of a mountain. The house is severely out of level, from the mountain sloping downward. Doors/windows do not shut properly. The bathroom vanity drawers open themselves 6-8 inches due to the slant. After a couple days of sleeping in the bed perpendicular to the mountain, headaches/vertigo issues started, so we needed to change the direction our head faced. 2) All beds are upstairs. The bathroom is downstairs. There is no handrail on the staircase and it's open on one side. It seems unsafe and concerning especially for children in the middle of the night. 3) The freeway (4 lane road) runs less than a couple hundred feet behind the house, therefore you can hear constant traffic and semi trucks. Also, there was a mouse in the house for 2 of our 5 nights, which ate some of our sealed snacks off the cupboard.
Description of the place was accurate. We had a nice stay and enjoyed the national forest
Great little cabin. Beautiful area.
Really happy we booked this place! Perfect for a weekend getaway. Ashley was also very responsive and helpful!
Beautiful cabin in the woods. Hot tub was wonderful and such a relaxing get-a-way. Ashley was so responsive up to and including the day we arrived.

Ashley was a terrific host! We had some unexpected personal issues arise during the time of our stay; Ashley always responded quickly (usually within 15 minutes) to our various inquiries and was very flexible and supportive when we needed to extend our stay at the last minute.
The cabin is SO cozy and charming - and the hot tub was all warmed up for our arrival. It was everything we hoped for. Thanks, Ashley!
Beautiful cabin, very secluded and private. Ashley was a great host and very helpful. Loved that it was pet friendly as well. Will definitely be staying again :)
Great place with a nice big hot tub we loved it!!
Just as was described

Beautiful, modern cabin with charming and comfortable decor in a scenic wooded area near a river with lots of trails and outdoor activities. Enjoyed having our pups with us. Very quiet. Really enjoyed the stay!!! Cell service was a little spotty and internet wasn’t the greatest. But being from the mountains myself you can’t really expect the highest speeds.
was a great stay!
Enjoyed our stay!
This cabin was beautiful and just what we wanted. We ate in Elkins and skied at Timberline. Great weekend. Thanks for being so responsive to my questions. I would highly recommend renting this cabin.

My group and I had a great time just relaxing and playing board games all weekend, went snow tubing and the hot tub was a wonderful addition to the cabin. The sky at night was absolutely beautiful and it was a very peaceful quiet location which is exactly what we were looking for! The cabin was very clean and cozy when we arrived, linens fully provided. Didn’t even need an extra blanket! The Wi-Fi is a little spotty but it still works- perfect for our remote retreat :)
A wonderful getaway in the woods. beautiful views to accompany a beautiful cabin. Quick and easy check in and the hot tub makes it worth it by itself!

We had a nice stay in Ashley's place mid January. There was some snow and ice which made it hard to get out of the driveway, so we left the car at the top of the driveway and that worked out for us.

All the leaves on trees were down, minimizing the privacy. Seen from cabin was train track and RV parks.

We felt the kitchen was well stocked with pots, we could cook all the food we brought. Smoke on the Water BBQ recommended for lunch or dinner.
Would be a great place for fishing, hiking, drive to skiing. We wanted a cozy cabin, private with hot tub, and we got that. We enjoyed our stay.
we absolutely loved the place! it was perfect for our little getaway. cabin was clean and well stocked. would definitely rent again!
We loved our stay! Would love to stay there again sometime! They are very accommodating!

The cabin was everything we could have asked for and more. We unfortunately visited West Virginia during a very cold time (-30 wind chills) but the cabin was very cozy and relaxing. Some reviews made it seem like the hot tub was very easily seen from the road; however, I'm pretty sure we only saw 1 car every 6-8 hours. We felt very secluded and it was overall very quiet. Our pups enjoyed the stay as well! We loved the addition of the dog bowls. Would stay again 😊

Place was perfect. Ashley was very quick to respond. Overall it was great place to stay.

10/10 recommend!
Nice secluded cabin for a reasonable price!

Ashley’s place was accurately presented. The location of the cabin is right above a RV park, but it’s secluded and private for a true getaway experience. That was the only minor inconvenience, however my travel bros and I had a great time! Thank you, Ashley.
This is the perfect place to stay in Elkins, WV. Cute little cabin that was tucked away and had all the amenities you could ask for. 😊

The inside of the cabin is beautiful. It is clean and everything listed is provided. Ashley is very quick to communicate.
If you are from the city and looking for something secluded this would be considered that in your opinion. This cabin is close to hiking trails which we took advantage of and there are many resources in the cabin to help you decide where to go.
I would recommend this cabin to a friend or family member.
Awesome Stay! Beautiful cabin and Ashley was quick to respond! Only wish was the fireplace was wood burning. Overall though… Highly recommend!!!
Place was great! Very great location!

Our stay at this cabin in the woods was completely perfect!! The cabin is absolutely beautiful and has everything you need for the perfect stay!! We really enjoyed the surrounding area- so much to do and see!! We highly recommend this cabin to anyone who is looking for some quiet time in the mountains of West Virginia at a great price!!
Great communication and location easy to access everything around elkins. Very clean.
Great little cabin outside of Elkins! Check in was super easy and the hot tub was a great addition.
Beautiful location! We loved the hot tub.
Beautiful place with activities close by for the outdoor person
Great cabin! Super nice!

Ashley and Freddie were amazing! The cabin is in a central location to many cool spots and is very cozy. Him and Ashley were both extremely friendly and helpful!

Nice and secluded! Perfect if you are staying with your dog. The highway traffic can be a little loud during the morning hours of the week if you are a light sleeper, but other than that this was a very nice place for a little getaway!
Very cozy and cute cabin. Love the interiors and the hot tub is just amazing.
Great cabin! Clean, private, great location.
We loved the secluded location and that the cabin was just a short drive/decent walk from the river! The area was really fun to explore and we just had a great time.
Loved this cabin! Can’t wait to come back !
Quiet and quaint. If you’re looking for a private weekend getaway to unplug from your phones, this is it! Very clean and cozy.

Our family had a wonderful stay at the cabin! It was located in a great spot for the places we planned to visit during our stay and it was only 10 minutes from a grocery store. The cabin was clean and comfortable, and the hot tub was perfect after hikes, horseback riding, and whitewater rafting.
Awsome cabin and wildlife decor. Clean and hot tub cleaned. Close to stores, entertainment and all outdoor attractions within an hour

Ashley provided great communication prior to the trip and check-in. The location is convenient to explore the surrounding area and the trees and foliage block out the road nearby. We really enjoyed relaxing in the hot tub and being able to take our dog with us.
Great host and a great house. Will definitely be bringing our kids next time!
Very clean and quiet. Was in town for four nights hiking and fly fishing and found the cabin central to everywhere I went. Great communication from the host as well. Great stay.
Perfect size and great location near creek for fishing.

Fantastic cozy little cabin. Access to the river and close proximity to a lot of things. The owners are def putting some time and money into the place to make it nice. Would come and stay again. Ashley was a pleasure to work with.

This cabin was great! Everything you could need and close to lots of activities! Ashley was wonderful to work with. We had a small issue with the hot tub, but they were more than accommodating in fixing the issue! It was a wonderful get away!

This is a quiet, clean, lovely cabin. Super close to hundreds of hikes. The kitchen has everything you need. We only ate out once, preferring to enjoy the cabin space. It is only a few mins from Elkins - easy to grab groceries there. We brought our two dogs and really appreciate the places that allow pets because we love to hike and vacation with them. The owners responded to any questions I had in seconds. Check in was easy with a door code. There is a queen bed in a separate room, then a double and bunk beds. The beds were clean and comfortable. Although a large road is nearby, the cabin is on a side road which is nice to walk on also. It’s very quiet, with views of the river below. We had a great time here and will return again. The internet is not super fast here, but is enough for our needs. This is about being in nature. Highly recommend this wonderful spot!

This was a wonderful place to stay. Ashley contacted me prior to check in to let me know the place was ready. The property was quiet, peaceful, and clean. I was near a number of natural spots that I wanted to visit. Location was ideal, close to parks and town. Hot tub, linens, bathroom, and kitchen were clean. Hot tub was private for early morning and evening relaxation. I was able to prepare breakfast in her kitchen and make coffee before taking off for the day. I would stay again.
Very small dinner table
Great place! Clean and comfortable. The set up is lovely. The location is great. Would stay again.
Very clean and very responsive host- had a great stay!

The cabin was impeccably clean and cozy! Just minutes to downtown Elkins, where we found restaurants and shops to explore. The deck-level hot tub was just what we needed to complete our cabin getaway!

Photos simply don’t do this cabin justice. The interior is gorgeous and looks just as a mountain cabin should in my opinion. We had a dog with us and he enjoyed the yard and I also enjoyed it because there is a bank there that will not allow your dog to roam into the road. The location is only 8 minutes from the nearest town which has plenty of places to eat and a Walmart. Ashley was an awesome host and was excellent at communicating with us. Would highly recommend.
Very quiet location, even though close to highway. Great location to see the area from. Hot tub was great and owners communication was great.
Great place to stay!
Ashley's cabin is very nice and comfortable. Check in was easy. Location was close enough to Elkins to drive there in roughly 15 minutes. Everything was clean and very well kept. Recommended.

Great place to stay!

Excellent! We had an issue with the hot tub and they came out and fixed it in like 5 mins! They even shocked and salted the driveway. Thank you!!

Solid cabin with a Christian/hunting theme. Hot tub and kitchen were great. Satellite wifi was too slow for streaming, but satellite TV was good. Friendly hosts were very attentive about replacing missing amenities and salting the driveway. The gravel driveway is a little steep, and snow/ice is frequent when we went in January. If you’re going in winter, your safest bet is 4WD, snow-tires, or chains. We have a 2WD Civic and couldn’t make it out one day due to ice, but some timely salting and cinder helped.

My boyfriend and I spent a snowy weekend in the cabin and it was great! Views from the back balcony where the hot tub was were super pretty, especially the stars at night! The inside was cute and clean. Stocked with all the amenities you might need. We definitely would recommend to anyone! If you’re going during a snowy time of year, I would suggest a 4wd vehicle.. the driveway is steep!
Nice stay in this cute rental cabin! Not as remote as I expected, the hot tub is visible to the nearby road, but overall a great stay.

We had a sweet and comfortable stay in this cabin for New Years. The weather was not in our favor so we ended up spending a lot more time inside the cabin than we had anticipated. The space was very clean and instructions were clear and accurate . I think the cabin probably feels more secluded in the spring /summer when the trees are filled in but enjoyable none the less.

Ashley was so great to work with. Everything was easy and smooth, the place is a perfect getaway and as advertised! It was clean, comfortable, had everything we needed, and the hot tub was amazing to relax in. I highly recommend this stay!!!
We had a great time with my family!! Place was so quiet and relaxing !!

This cabin is super cute but small. I definitely think it best suits a small group of friends or family— but certainly not 6-8 people. If you have pets, beware that there is NO fenced in backyard(let alone a backyard at all) like advertised which is super disappointing since we brought dogs along on our trip. The check in/out process was easy and the host was prompt with her responses. Overall, while cute, there were a few too many issues that I made the host aware of that were unsettling. Glad for the experience but would not return.
We loved this cabin! Super clean, nice beds, easy to use hot tub, easy checkin- and out, great location ect. We hope to come back!

This cabin is beautiful and clean and went above my expectations. It was so cozy and relaxing and being able to sit outside and look at all the stars was breathtaking. The owners have out done themselves here and were so kind and made sure everything was taken care of before our arrival and during our stay. The communication was fantastic and there was never an unanswered question. I highly recommend them and will be using them again.

Very nice cabin our family stayed here for thanksgiving and we absolutely loved it. Ashley was very communicative and has a fast response. Jacuzzi was working great and felt great! Overall I would recommend this cabin for a nice vacation away from home with family and friends.
A great way to spend a kid free weekend with someone special. I am going to recommend this place to all my friends for a nice get away.
Thank you Ashley for being such a great host! Everything was perfect and my family really enjoyed your cozy cabin in the most beautiful state. We look forward to visiting again!
A great cabin in a great location, close to a lot of hiking and fishing and still close enough to town you can easily eat out or go shopping.

This was a great little cabin to stay in. It looks small from the outside, but it was more than enough room for the two of us. The decor is a cozy and charming log cabin vibe, with fun little touches throughout. The hot tub was our favorite spot- at night, you can see the stars and you feel like you’re in the trees. The full kitchen and laundry was helpful too.
Wifi was a little slow but def enough to search for a hike, text, whatever. Directv was nice to watch a show at night
We drove to go horseback riding and hiking too. Just a great little getaway!

The place was decorated nicely and had a cozy cabin feel. Unfortunately, perhaps because it was the weekend, there was a good amount of noise coming from the nearby RV park. Very kind owners! Quick and efficient communication throughout. They gave us tips on what hikes to do and what to expect at each location. The cabin was in a secluded and quiet area. The view was spectacular and the cabin was extremely clean! We will be going back 😊

Had an absolutely wonderful time at Ashley's cabin. Nestled in the woods with a hot tub on the deck, we were able to enjoy stargazing at night or a fire in the firepit out front. Ashley was really helpful and very quick to respond to any questions. We hope to be back soon!
Such a beautiful place to stay at! Very clean and well maintained! Hot tub is a must do, so make sure you get in when you stay!!
Great place, friendly host. Will be back for sure.
Thank you for sharing your unique space with us!
