Scott went above and beyond for my parents for the weekend. He was extremely responsive and more than generous with his time. I 100% recommend spending time in Scott's cabin.
Comfortable tiny home with plenty of space to move around and not feel like you’re in an actual tiny home. Laid out well and appointed. Would absolutely stay here again when in the area.

The cabin was incredibly charming, clean and cozy! I loved the rustic aesthetic, hand crafted touches like the shower and stairs to the loft. Scott is a great host - super helpful and responsive. I will definitely reserve again for future trips to Elkins. Take me Home Country Roads!
Scott truly thought of everything when preparing the place! The outdoor space and fire pit are right along the creek. Will definitely stay again!

Perfect weekend getaway. Tiny home well laid out with great use of space. Easy jumping off point for tons of adventures in the area. Scott was communicative and the check-in process was so easy. We would definitely stay here again. I was super excited to make a fire in the outdoor firepit. Right on a little creek flowing through the campground. It was beautiful and peaceful. Great weekend.
Great place to stay! Highly recommend

This place is great! Scott put a lot of thought into the place when he was building it and it shows. The shower might have been my favorite part, with the corrugated steel and stone combo. It sits right along the stream and close to the mountains. My only regret is that we didn't go prior to daylight savings time ending, so it got dark super early. Definitely worth a visit and I'm sure the grain silo home he's building is going to be just as nice! Thank you for a great place to stay!

Scott’s place is really lovely. If you are in Elkins to visit the college or do something else in town, it is very conveniently located but nicer than staying in a hotel. The interior is really upscale - nothing “contractor grade.” You have everything you need including kitchen, washer/dryer and great shower. We didn’t get to sit out at the fire pit bcuz it was raining but it’s right by the stream and lovely. Smoke on the Water restaurant is also closeby so we ate well also!
Scott is a great host and his home is beautiful. The bed is super comfortable and the overall vibe of the house is very cozy and has a great homey feel.

We loved our weekend stay in this cabin. It is beautifully decorated and we had everything we needed inside and out! The fire pit out back was a perfect place to relax at the end of the day and listen to the creek while enjoying a fire. I highly recommend this cabin and the host was great!
Cute home and great for our stay! Thanks for being a great host.
Great Tiny Home in quiet campground. Great host and communication.
Great stay. Exactly as advertised. Thanks!
Awesome little cabin on a creek! Super clean and comfy! Plus a great restaurant/bar in walking distance!

My daughter and I needed a safe, comfortable and convenient place to stay while we were on our fishing trip. We found all of the above and more. Great location to everything.. Restaurants, convenience stores. Attractions such as Blackwater Falls, Dolly Sods, Seneca Rock and the WV Wildlife Center are all with an hour to hour/half away. I highly recommend Scott’s place.
Scott’s place was amazing. My family was very happy not only with the service but also location. We are definitely looking forward to visiting again….. and soon.
Really cute place. Scott was great at communicating and accommodated us last minute.

Scott's place is wonderful! It was the perfect place for relaxing after hiking. The bed was comfortable, the shower was awesome and had great water pressure + the hot water lasted, no issues with the wifi, and the kitchen had everything I needed and more. Would definitely stay again!!

This place is nothing short of awesome and might be the most cozy and comfortable place I’ve ever stayed. The bed is large and cozy, with soft sheets and nice pillows to rest your head after a long day. I cooked a nice breakfast each morning in the kitchen, and the shower is spacious and water pressure is excellent. Here’s a tip: the sides of the couch fold down of you pull them towards you if you want to use it for napping!
I’ll be back next year!

Really well done place. The wood slabs wainscoting, handmade loft ladder, barn door, locally sourced creek stone shower floor, etc. Conveniently located within 10 minutes to restaurants, Kroger, and Walmart. Looking forward to checking out the silo cabin Scott is just beginning to build.
We met Scott our host and he was so friendly and wanted to know of our needs! Our rental was clean, awesome, loved the stone in shower floor a super nice stay !

Very nice and unique tiny home. Used this as our base camp to explore Seneca Rocks/Spruce Knob/Dolly Sods Wilderness (although still a bit of a drive to each of those areas- approx 40-60 minute drive depending on which one of those areas you’re heading to). We enjoyed the fire pit in the backyard and the wood that was provided for it. We also made use of the grill and cooked out and had dinner outside at the picnic table. Overall, a great stay and clean place with solid amenities. Would recommend.

The house has a lot of love and attention put into it: local stone in the shower, handmade stairs to the loft, a vaulted ceiling with corrugated metal, attention paid to landscaping by the deck. The kitchen and bathroom were extremely clean with everything you might need. There was even firewood to make a fire in the fire pit by the creek. We could walk over to the nearby barbecue restaurant which was handy. Scott is personable and responds quickly if you have a question. It was the perfect landing spot after hiking and backpacking in the area! Would stay here again.

Our stay at Scott's tiny home was perfect! The house accommodated 3 adults and a dog quite well as we were in town for a relative's birthday party.
We enjoyed spending time outside next to the creek listening to the water flow. The neighbors at the nearby campground sites were friendly.
We also enjoyed being able to walk over to Smoke on the Water, the BBQ restaurant right next door. Everything I ate there was delicious!
Downtown Elkins is also a short drive away and we enjoyed TipTop coffee and Byrd's House of Donuts for breakfast stops.
Thanks again Scott--we really enjoyed our stay!

The cabin was perfect for a weekend getaway in the mountains. The location was convenient to town and to the national forest for some great day hiking. The cabin itself was the perfect size for 2 people and a large dog. Scott was very communicative and hospitable. We would definitely come back again!
Scott was a great host who takes great care of his guests. Very nice house with everything you need.

Awesome spot. Great location, tucked away and near a lovely creek but close to everything in Elkins. Wifi was really slow/spotty but it worked enough for what we needed and was a nice break from technology. Would stay there again.
Very nice cabin. Well designed. Good location near town. Good jumping off point to Elkins, Seneca Rocks, Spruce Knob, etc. Easy check-in. Good communication. Definite recommend!

We went to this tiny home for relaxation and Scott gave us a full experience!
Scott: He was amazing. Answered emails very fast, left us a welcoming note with mints and origami, and complimentary wood. He made sure we were not lacking anything.
The tiny home: We loved all the details in this home. From the railroad nails used as door handles to the rock floor in the shower. So well done with a lot of attention to detail. It has a cabin rustic industrial look with a modern touch. The house was clean and smelled really nice. Although it is a tiny home, it feels much bigger and spacious. There are two bbq in the back with a picnic table, fire pit and Adirondack style chairs. But the best is the creek and the mountain in the back. It makes you feel you’re in the middle of a forest. We enjoyed so much listening to all the different birds and the water sounds. The area is so quiet and nice! Coming from a city this was heaven!
Surroundings: There’s a bbq grill place at walking distance that we can recommend. At close driving distance you can find the town of Elkins. If you stay there don’t miss the Audra State Park or visiting the surrounding towns.
Overall, the experience was great and we recommend without reservations this place. We do hope to come back for another stay.

The inside will blow you away. The details in this tiny cabin are amazing from the rail spike cabinet nobs to the stone floor shower it is incredible, Remote controls on the ceiling fans and a wonderful stove/microwave and fridge! The creek behind it was just wonderful and its very close to Elkins.

Adorable little cabin, well stocked with all the essentials! The view out the front window was mostly the storage unit across the lot, but the creek and the fire pit in the back definitely made up for it.
Very peaceful spot and a great home-base for day trips around WV’s mountain country. Thank you!
Another great stay at the Tiny House! It was perfect once again. Thank you!

Very clean, very well put together. Lovely wood trim and accents. Very nice kitchen and bath, comfy bed. The stone floored shower was a delight. Lovely view from the windows (and from the porch and grounds in warmer weather). The bbq at the restaurant next door was excellent. Very well placed for day trips around and into Elkins. Krogers is just down the road. I’ll be back!
It was also very quiet in March.
A great little cabin/tiny house.
The cabin is perfect- easy to find, clean, very comfortable! Will book again! Only about 35 min to good skiing at white grass!
Look no further. Great place. Great location. COMFY bed and the shower was to die for. Will totally rent again.

This is a fantastic little cabin! It is in a safe and quiet location, super easy to find, just a mile or two from the center of town. At arrival, it was spotlessly clean, with top notch furnishings, appliances and beautiful flooring throughout. We loved the style - a cool mix of wood, modern and industrial! The shower was terrific, and what a convenience having the stacked washer/dryer on hand. The main floor bed had an extremely comfortable mattress. We used the couch/futon for sleeping - also very comfortable. The kitchen appliances and fixtures were new and high-end and we had a full array of dishes, pots, pans and utensils. Every imaginable need was supplied-- soap and shampoo, laundry detergent, dish detergent, paper towels, lysol wipes, windex, garbage bags, the list goes on. TV reception was superb and wifi worked just fine. Our host was terrific throughout - quick to respond, friendly and helpful. Needless to say, we will recommend this cabin to our friends and family. Five stars all the way. Thank you Scott!

A diamond in the rough! Extremely comfortable, clean, updated cabin. Well located near lots of trails but very well
Secluded for privacy. Loved it!
Great stay. The best place we’ve stayed in Elkins. I’d highly recommend it.

Just as described. We got several great hikes in around the area despite having full days of rain. The trees are transitioning and beautiful. The rain meant the trails were empty. Scott's tiny house was perfect to come back to so we could warm up and rest up for the next day. Great shower, clean, comfy. Kitchen had everything we needed. Propane BBQ got some use as well. Seamless check in and Scott was extremely responsive. Internet was a bit temperamental but that was a plus for me. My dogs didn't want to come back home and neither did I.
Great stay, would definitely go again.

Wonderful stay at the tiny house. To be honest, it really isn't that tiny. :)
Extremely clean, seamless check-in, great communication. It was a great location for my weekend adventures hiking in and around Elkins and Canaan Valley.
Tiny house is located in a campground, which was very quiet and in cell service (Verizon). Wifi was a bit slow at times, but worked well enough! House had everything I needed, including drip coffeemaker to provide critical fuel for hiking. :)
Would definitely stay again.

My daughter and I had a wonderful stay. Brian was great at communication and even left us some firewood. The restaurant next door was very convenient as was the overall location. The shower was amazing with great water pressure which I wasn’t expecting in a campground.

Brian was an excellent host providing a free set of fire wood for us to use! The house is adorable and a great place to stay in! We loved the chairs and bench in the back. Convenient location to get to ether Elkins or Blackwater Falls!

We had a wonderful stay! The house was very clean and had everything we needed. The kitchen was especially well-stocked. We enjoyed the proximity to hikes/attractions in the area (Chimney Top, Seneca Rocks, Blackwater Falls, Canaan Valley chairlift).
The stay was excellent, just as expected.

What a great place. Very clean and well appointed. The cabin had everything you could need. Easy check-in. The owner was very attentive and truly cared about our experience. Private spot along the creek but not secluded. Will definitely return.
Great Tiny House!
This place was absolutely satisfying to stay in. Definitely a 12/10 and meet above my expectations. Very pleased and would book again.

Great house and a great host! You're getting exactly what you see in the pictures; there are no surprises or misleading photos. The house was very clean. It's about a 5 minute drive to downtown Elkins and within 30ish minutes of a ton of great outdoorsy attractions: Seneca Rocks, National Forests, Canaan Valley, among many others. The campground was very quiet when we were staying there, and everyone we saw was very friendly. Having a fully functional kitchen was also really convenient for a tiny home. There's a nice creek/forest right behind the house. All in all a great trip and we would be happy to go back.

Great little getaway. A little farther than we expected from Blackwater Falls but it worked out. Close to many food options, Walmart, but far enough away in the campground to be quiet.
Very clean, well thought out, and we would totally come back if we need to be in the area.
Beautiful and clean. Quiet and peaceful. We had a wonderful overnight stay. Brian was very nice and helpful. Will definitely stay again and recommend.

Brian was a wonderful host. He was quick at responding and taking care of little things. The cabin is very cute and neat and clean. It is very apt for upto 4 people. It has all the things one would need for a comfortable stay. Would definitely recommend.

A wonderful quaint cabin nestled up to a creek in back. (Creek is dry right now due to no rain, not Brian’s fault). It was everything that was promised and more. Brian our host was attentive and full of information. We will be going back.
What a great property! The inside is cute and immaculate. Absolutely love the aesthetics. The host communicated well and made sure we had everything we needed. Will definitely stay again!

I can’t rave enough about how perfect this little cabin was. It was impeccably clean. Everything I needed was there. The location was fantastic - very peaceful but close to town. I’ll definitely stay again….already looking at dates of when I can go back!

Well appointed house. Just 3 minutes to local grocery store. Outdoor area is great to cookout on either the charcoal or gas grill. It is next to other travel trailers but still feels private. Would stay again.
Excellent location and host. I will definitely return. Super happy to have discovered this spot!

The cabin at Smoky Bottom Campground was a nice get away for the weekend. For a small space, it was well-decorated and and we loved the unique style inside. There was plenty of room. The bed was very comfortable, and we loved the rustic look of the shower. Lots of space for a couple or a small family. The fire pit out back made for relaxing and peaceful evenings. Definitely would stay again!
It’s so nice to stay in a place that is well maintained and the owner supplies all most everything you need hats off to the Jason looking forward to returning soon
Great place! It was a perfect get away and very peaceful. 10/10 would highly recommend.
Great spot for a weekend trip. Very clean and a short drive to many attractions
Beautiful cabin and￼￼￼ scenery! very private setting and has all the amenities you would need. Great fishing all around the area. We will definitely be staying here again!

This place was the perfect stay for a friends trip to West Virginia for a ski weekend. We got a lot of snow the day before our trip and Jason sent a message the morning we were arriving assuring us that the road had been plowed and that the path and porch had been shoveled, which was so nice! The place was very comfortable and clean and we enjoyed cooking a couple of big group meals in the large kitchen and hanging out around the big island. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook and bake.
The bedrooms were comfortable and we had fun having a big sleepover in the bunk bed room.
We loved the outdoor space as well and had a fire in the fire pit at night after a big day of skiing. It was incredibly peaceful standing out by the river, in the snow, around our fire, taking in the fresh air, watching the little ice flows drift by on the river.
We are already making plans to come back in warmer weather. We loved this place, and Jason was a very accommodating host!

We were two families (4 adults, 4 teens) & 2 dogs staying at Jason's beautiful cabin right along the river. I can imagine this is also an awesome place to stay in the other seasons of the year, but what a beautiful setting to see the river with the falling snow.
We had a lovely stay and were really comfortable. The kitchen is super well-equipped and we love to cook - so that was an added bonus! Would 100% stay again & recommend.

This was our third time staying at the cabin, and we love coming back every time! We spent Christmas here and are already planning our next trip here. Highly recommend for a remote getaway, with comfort amenities like WiFi, full kitchen, tv, hammocks on the deck, fire pits, and nature walks!
Perfect everything. Hope to return again soon.
It was a beautiful and new cabin. Perfect place for relaxing in a very private and peaceful vibe.

Beautiful place to stay! Jason was very easy to communicate with and was flexible with what we needed. The home was beautiful, with the wrap around deck and river being the highlight of the home to us! We definitely plan to come back and stay here again when we have more vacations in WV.

We visited for the Forest Festival and had an AMAZING time. The river view is fantastic! We hope to return in the summer, when we can enjoy the water. We felt at home and had everything we needed. Jason was very responsive and even had the house available for an early check-in!
Thank you Jason!
Great location right on Shavers Fork. Very private but not too far from Elkins where there’s plenty to do.
Great place for a cabin get away with a group . The cabin is modern and private . Jason was great at answering questions.

This is an amazing place to stay in West Virginia. We did not know a lot about the area but Jason has pretty much textbook instructions on how you can spend your time there for the weekend. The place is gorgeous and about 10 feet off the river. I will hopefully be coming back here when I get the time.

Jason’s house is beautiful and unlike any we’ve been able to find in such a rural setting. The location and amenities are amazing! We especially enjoyed the great room, well apportioned kitchen, comfy sleeping areas, and the river right outside the door. We look forward to coming back and spending more time.
We have stayed here twice and will definitely be coming back some more. Wonderful place to stay with family or friends and enjoy the nature and the river! Couldn’t ask for a better get away location!
This place is amazing. It’s really private and on a really sweet spot on the water. The house itself is super nice and Jason was a great host. I would definitely stay again.
Great location - Beautiful Modern Cabin !

Great place to stay with amazing proximity to the river! Wonderful views all around. Great fire pit for fires each night and wood was provided so that was great! Very clean and had most pots and pans for cooking. I would highly recommend this place if you are in Elkins.

The bungalow was perfect for what I wanted for my family vacation. The river was little low but that is not preventable. My son and son-in-law caught well over 100 fish, mostly small mouth bass, and mostly by kayaking from upstream down to the bungalow and from the bungalow downstream. We all enjoyed the river and the activities.
The house was very clean, and perfect for our family.
Jason’s communications to us were quick. The check in, check out, and location instructions were “spot on” as were the tips he left us for using the river and property.
I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for some fishing and family time that is private but not far from other needs like dining, stores, and other outdoor activities.

This place is magic. Jason always answer all the questions quickly. We have a wonderful and fun weekend with our family. Thank you so much Jason for everything. This place have everything that you need to have a great vacations. I totally recommend it.

Place was very secluded and perfectly located just off the river. If you’re looking for relaxation and a stay that feels like home, this is perfect. Enjoyed fishing, canoeing, and golfing over at Canaan valley. Would certainly stay again.
We enjoyed our weekend at the house. Very peaceful, clean, about 20 mins from town. My 2 year old loved being close to the water, and exploring around.

House is as described. Made use of fire pit but too cold for water activity; but nice to have the river right there. Elkins is a great town…easy to get to Seneca Rocks, High Falls Trail and Audra, so much to choose from. Visit Tip Top on 3rd Street, coffee is excellent and decor charming…pizza at Mama Mias was excellent.

Great location, very relaxing, took a couple naps on the porch with rapids in the background! Dog friendly, they loved swimming. Campfire creek side under the stars was awesome! Wish we could have stayed longer…Hope to come back so we can utilize canoes/kayaks!
Beautiful place and excellent host!
Really fantastic house in a great location. We used it as a base of operations for a ski trip, would absolutely come back again during the summer to take advantage of the water.

Jason’s place is even better than the photos. Such a stunning river view and wonderful accommodations! There was a bit of snow during our stay and Jason even plowed the driveway for us. Can’t recommend enough!

Beatiful house really close to the river. Everything was great.
I will say though that the direction should include a big red cattle gate you have to open and close to get to the driveway.
Great property within an easy drive of snowshoe
The place was amazing! Perfect for a getaway in wild wonderful West Virginia.
Wonderful cabin, beautiful river, excellent host!

This is a top-quality airbnb destination. Beautiful house and perfect setting. Jason was extremely communicative and helped us have a great stay. We barely felt the need to ever leave the house. The river, deck, kayakers and bridges on the property were great to keep my family entertained.
My only critique, as someone who loves to cook, is the kitchen was a little disorganized kitchen. It certainly had everything you needed, just hard to find and some cooking implements weren't in the best condition. But hey its a cabin not the set of Iron Chef - so no real complaints.

Great place to stay! Super secluded and right on the water. The water was low when we were there but it was still great to go sit in to cool off after hiking. The fire pit is also right on the water and that made evening fires even better. House was very clean. Kitchen is perfect for cooking. Tons of space.

Our family enjoyed this house by the water. If you love animals, this place is great. There is a hummingbird feeder with at least 5 active hummingbirds. The neighbor farmers cows came over onto the property to greet us twice. We saw deer in the yard. Tip: When the sun is setting, walk down to the water and left to the right. We saw deer crossing there each night. We also heard many coyotes in the distance and saw one on property twice. If you love the outdoors, this place is for you. The place was spacious and clean, we enjoyed the deck area multiple times each day. The water wasn't high enough to kayak in (First week in August) and the rocks on the bottom of the river were too slippery to walk/wade in the water. Please note that the kayak, tube and canoe usage is NOT included in the cost of the rental, it is an additional $75. You pay via the app and the code is sent to unlock the items. There was plenty of firewood and Jason was a great host. We had no problem and enjoyed every second there!

Love this property! The location is the perfect spot to get away and relax. We loved drinking our coffee in the morning, sitting on the porch, just listening to the river. The fire pit was so nice just to hangout by in the evenings. The home was very clean! ( I’m kind of OCD when it comes to rentals and cleanliness ). Jason was so easy to get in contact with if anything came up or if we had any questions. He has some fun small trails around his property that we enjoyed exploring. The weather was perfect for kayaking and playing on the river. It has a great open concept kitchen which made cooking family dinner enjoyable. Highly recommend this rental!

Property was amazing and exactly what we were looking for.Jason gave great directions to house and was great at answering any questions we had. We weren’t able to enjoy the river because of the temperature. Might have to come back in the summer.

Great place for a mountain vacation. If you’re looking for a place to relax,enjoy the river and explore...this is a great place. House has everything you need and more, making for a great place to stay. We had two families and dogs and everyone had a great time. Definitively recommended this house!

Beautiful cabin, steps away from water. Extremely clean, allergen free, and perfect for our family of four plus two dogs. Very nice kitchen. We didn't see anyone the whole time except for the neighbor cows!

We had a fantastic time here! We did a quick 3 day trip, but enjoyed it so much! Having the river right out front was amazing, you can't beat laying in the hammock and listening to the water. Jason was super quick to respond throughout the entire trip! We are looking to come back in the summer and enjoy a longer trip! PS we brought our dogs, and brought a little doggy gate and just blocked off the wrap around porch so they could roam there without us having to worry about them running off anywhere, and they could still see us while we hung out in the bottom fire pit next to the river, totally recommend to anyone looking for a nice secluded place in nature, but its only 20 min away from a walmart for all your necessities!
Fantastic location! Was a peaceful weekend getaway right on the water and near great hiking. Highly recommend.

Jason was in constant communication with us and was super quick with responses. He Helped us out so many times throughout the weekend!! The house was super clean and even better than described. Our family had an amazing time and we were able to enjoy the West Virginia winter in complete comfort. We can’t wait to return during the summer and have some more fun!!
Beautiful house located right on a river. Great weekend retreat from the city life. Would highly recommend to anyone.

This is an amazing place. Even the drive up to the house is spectacular. Our stay was shortly after (and even during) a snowstorm, and the setting was great. Definitely a place to visit year-round! The host was super responsive and the place definitely exceeded our expectations!
Great stay beautiful space tranquil location right in almost heaven
Great place with beautiful views! Very clean and easy to find with the directions Jason provided before check in.

Jason was an amazing host. His house & property were beautiful, clean, & made for an awesome trip with fun memories. I frequently communicated with him, & he always responded quickly & respectfully. He was very generous & helpful. I highly recommend using this location to make fun family & friend memories. We would absolutely come back. Thank you Jason!
beautiful scenery, relaxing and clean place to have a winter getaway. thanks!

We loved the cabin and Jason provided everything you could ask for in a weekend stay. He has cornhole boards and a few other games, camping chairs you can take down by the fire pit, and logs already cut for you to build a fire. The view of the crystal clear river in the morning was incredible. We definitely recommend and would love to come back!
The perfect secluded getaway by the river with fun bridges to play on. House was modern and clean.
This is an exceptional location and a great house. I can't recommend it enough. Jason has everything ready for you to enjoy this special house on the river. We really enjoyed fishing and kayaking.
We had a nice time here! Jason was very helpful and quick to respond to messages. The view of the river is wonderful, right off the back deck. Great kitchen too!

The house is modern, well-designed, and lovely. Big windows so you can see outside and a great porch overlooking the river. And the bridges are pretty cool too. Jason was a great host and quick to respond to any questions.

The location is stunning, right on the river, in the middle of the woods, and in an area where shooting stars may as well be guaranteed. The house itself has all the essentials and was great. Aside from some spotty WiFi (which is expected in this area), we were extremely satisfied with our stay here, and the fact that it was peak fall foliage weekend made it all the better. Thank you for a great stay!
Beautiful, relaxing, and clean. Very well maintained.
We couldn’t have selected a better place to spend a week with our family in WV. You will never run out of things to do & not do ;) . Easily accommodates two families and great layout.

Fantastic! Great setting to relax and get away from it all. Very private setting. GPS will get you very close to the house but follow Jason's direction to get you the last couple of hundred yards down a private driveway. I look forward to staying there again.

Really enjoyed our stay, very private beautiful location that was tricky to find at night but Jason’s directions made it doable. Kayaking down the river is a must and the hiking in the area is great as well!
Great place, exactly as described. Would definitely recommend.

Quiet and quaint, this beautiful bungalow is exactly the break you need from the craziness and chaos of life! Well appointed, clean and contemporary, this home is the perfect combination of rustic chic - marrying the amenities of modern day living with the enjoyable back-to-basics sounds and sights of nature.

This house is beautiful! Right on the river. The option to rent the kayaks and floats was super convenient. We put the floats in the river at Stuart Recreation Center and floated down the river to the house - took about an hour, but the river was high and moving quickly. It probably would have taken longer without the rain storms the days before. Would definitely rent again!
Beautiful location along the river with great outdoor amenities. Not far from Elkins, but you feel very secluded. Jason was quick to respond to our questions and was a welcoming host.
Excellent cabin with perfect amenities to unplug yourself from the rest of the world!
The cabin is modern with all the amenities you could need. It is super clean and at a beautiful location!

Really a magical kind of spot where what you see in the pictures is exactly what you get. If you want a stylish, comfortable, pleasant little spot out on a river in the middle of absolute nowhere with ridiculous levels of privacy this is the spot. For my party, that was everything we were looking for and more.
Jason's place is heavenly, and very relaxing. Prepare for a weekend of solitude and peace.

Jason’s place was perfect for our relaxing family vacation. We spent most of our time on the beautiful deck watching the river, playing cards, and gazing at the most stars we had ever seen! The kitchen had everything we needed to prepare meals and when we didn’t feel like cooking we were just a quick drive away from delicious local restaurants. We miss the serene location already and hope we get the chance to visit again!

Jason’s place is gorgeous, spacious, relaxing, and fun. We enjoyed the table on the front porch, the fire pit, playing in the picturesque clear river, hanging out on the big sofas in the living room, and cooking in the well equipped kitchen. Jason was friendly and answered my questions before we arrived very quickly. While the river was too low this trip to use the kayaks and inter tubes, we look forward to a float trip next time! My eight person family group made a lot of memories here. Thank you, Jason!!
Such a wonderful place, a rare gem! We will definitely go back- house is gorgeous, scenery serene- haven’t had such a relaxing getaway in a very long time. Highly recommend.

The house is very nice. Having access to all the extra spices and the fully outfitted kitchen was a plus. The kitchen is able to prepare pretty much any meal you desire, all you have to do is bring the ingredients. The big sectional couch in the great room is very comfortable. We enjoyed being able to sit on the porch and listen to the river and being able to have music through the outside speakers as well.
The kayaks were fun to get out on and put around on the river. If you are looking to have a vacation away from all the hustle and bustle of life, and still have some creature comforts... This is the place.
If you want peace and quiet with friends this is the place! Thank you so much for everything Jason, we loved every second of our trip!
Place is comfortable, clean, and beautiful.
Jason's Place was beautiful inside and out. We enjoyed our stay very much.

I regularly do airbnb and I must this was one of the best houses I stayed in. The best word to describe the house is that is modern. The kitchen was amazing, the patio. Additionally we were able to use Jason’s water gear without any trouble. Its a very well maintained house and our group had a lot of fun. Thank you Jason for having us.

Jason’s place is amazing. The place was super clean, well stocked with all the essentials plus extras like coffee and condiments. Not to mention it was just beautiful and in the most beautiful surroundings. Jason was also very quick to respond and went above and beyond when we had a special request. I would highly recommend his place and can’t wait to come back.
Loved the stay in this river house!! Our group of 10 had a great time!

The cabin was so relaxing... had a great time hanging out... floating in the stream.. and chilling on covered part of porch when it rained.

Private spot on the river with easy access to float and relax. The inside is basic but in good condition with a comfortable bed. Very close to Elkins so getting groceries and take out was a breeze. Having the deck is nice although it could have used a hose down.
Great place on the water. Really nice porch to enjoy nature. Wish it was a bit easier to access the water but overall a really nice place to relax and get away from it all.

Such a great weekend getaway cabin! Had a wonderful time in the mountains on shavers fork river. The cabin was very clean inside and out with a great view overlooking the river. Definitely wanna come back in the future!

My husband and I very much enjoyed our stay for the weekend. The area is beautiful in spring with wildflowers blooming. Nice view of the river and just steps to Stuart Park. Very clean and comfortable bed. So refreshing and peaceful. Would have loved to stay longer.
Great retreat by the river. Great hosts. Thanks again
Great location & very peaceful getaway.
We enjoyed our stay and the view from the back porch! It would be nice to go there when the rhodendrons are blooming!
Great location! Everything we needed, very relaxing!

Great stay at the Riverside Retreat. The deck and view of the Shaver's Fork were just amazing, and we loved spending time there every morning just taking in the beauty. The property has many old growth trees and birds to watch and listen to and try to identify. We love how the deck has been built around one of the trees. Very comfortable chairs on the deck and inside. The cabin was spotless and comfortable. Andi and Billy have gone out of their way to provision the cabin with anything you could possibly need. We'd definitely stay again!

This was a great cabin in the perfect location. Very private and quiet ! Everything you need ! We loved our stay , even though it rained the whole time , it forced us to relax and nap more . We highly recommend this sweet cabin ❤️
This was a wonderful getaway! The cabin was perfectly located in a private setting on the river, but not far from town. Very clean and comfortable with an awesome deck!

We had such a great time at Andi and Billy’s cabin! It has everything you need to have a nice, relaxing, peaceful time on the river. We spent our time fishing, hiking, BBQing, and walking the little stream…in my kids words “to see where it starts and ends”. We loved the location! It was so close to town/shopping but also right across the street from hiking trails and the most beautiful view from an observation tower 3-4 miles up the mountain ( the drive up was just as cool as the view). Seriously though that view is a must and you won’t regret it! Andi and Billy were amazing hosts and even went above and beyond by checking on us after a big rainfall the night before! We definitely recommend and we hope to be back soon!
Awesome place! Loved being right on the water, across the street from hiking trails, and only 10 minutes from a grocery store. We had a lovely time!
Lovely cabin on the river.
Great area for tubing, relaxing, great views. Many other things to do.

We had an incredible weekend at Andi and Billy’s river cabin. The hosts were very helpful and responsive, the cabin was clean and had everything we needed (and more!), and our dogs had a great time playing in the river and hanging out on the porch with us. There isn’t much more I can say that the other glowing reviews haven’t already covered. We will definitely be back!

We had a great family vacation here! Beautiful place! Spotless and has everything you need for a great stay. Owners were great to work with and the communication was perfect. You will love the privacy and beautiful deck overlooking the water!

Perfect cabin get away. Cabin was sparkling clean and we were able to feel at home immediately. Being right on the water and still close to town was super convenient and relaxing. Will book again. Thank you Andi and Billy!
Great location for my dogs! They loved the outdoor space ,playing in the river, and the seclusion!
Nice, clean cabin on a beautiful river. What’s not to like!

This was a great spot on the river with a fully equipped kitchen. We spent lots of time on the deck and enjoyed the birds in the morning. Close to Elkins and to lots of hikes and other things to do. Very clean and perfectly located. Would definitely stay here again.
Great location.
Great riverside experience! Place is super clean & has a view/access that can’t be beat. If you’re a fly fisher, walk out only 100 yards or so to the rapids in one of the clearest waterway I’ve seen.

We had a wonderful weekend! The cabin was beautiful and our host was extremely helpful. The kids enjoyed roasting marshmallows at the fire pit and loved exploring the area. Everything you need for a great say was readily available, right down to extra blankets for the chilly weather! Highly recommend a stay at the retreat!

The cabin was a great retreat for a long weekend. Not far from Elkins but tucked away nicely in a small river valley, it's a perfect escape. Everything is well furnished, and the river view is really nice. Communication was great, and everything was as advertised. Wireless was excellent. Would definitely stay here again.

We were hesitant to rent the cabin because of the outside pictures but relied on the inside pics, reviews, and the proximity to the water to make our final decision and we're so glad we did. We enjoyed the rustic look of the outside but the cuteness, utility of space, and cleanliness were perfect for our 4 day getaway. There were 5 of us - 2 teens and 3 adults and we were completely comfortable. Andi and Billy were communicative before, during and after our stay. They ensured we had the best information for our first trout fishing outing - even pointing us to the local bait shop and letting us talk to their son. Plenty of linens for all of us as well as cookware, utensils, etc. It's the first time in a LONG time that there was actual satellite TV and internet that we didn't have to use our own credentials. Cleanup at the end of the stay was simple. We would definitely recommend - the pictures are as shown - the water is right there and you could easily launch a kayak or tie a float from the shore.
We had a great time! Wifi has a strong signal and is super quick. Great place for anyone who works from home. Our dogs had a great time. Easy access to many hiking trails nearby!

We had a peaceful weekend away at the Riverside Retreat. The cabin was very clean and spacious and provided everything we needed. We spent our days at White Grass snowshoeing and crosscountry skiing and our evenings enjoying the stars from our cabin. We enjoyed eating breakfast each morning with a view of the river rushing by. We hope to return next winter!
The house was great and had a beautiful view, we would definitely come again.
The location on the river is incredible. My family had the best time being intentionally “snowed in” together during a winter storm. Can’t wait to come back and see it in the other seasons, too.

The cabin was exactly what we needed for a long weekend away to relax and enjoy the natural beauty of West Virginia. The location was perfect considering the ease of access to public land across the road and proximity to town if you needed anything quick. The cabin had plenty of space, was comfortably furnished, and even had a TV with cable so I could watch college football! Although the weather was cold I was able to use the grill and enjoy the deck space overlooking the river. The overall peacefulness surrounding the cabin combined with the views and ease of access to nature has me already looking to book this place next spring!
Was great - just what we needed, Forrest with trails across the street!
Amazing stay. Everything was accurate and wonderful.

Great place. Secluded yet close to town. They have everything you need for a weekend (or longer away). The porch that looks onto the river is amazing and so relaxing. The beds are comfortable. Place is very clean. Our dogs loved it. Lots of outdoor stuff to do in the area. We will be back!
Wonderful place. Highly recommend.

Such a relaxing weekend on the river with our 2 pups. From roasting s’mores on the fire down by the river to relaxing inside watching a movie in the most cozy environment. This cabin is everything you need!

What a magical cabin. Everything was perfect. We really enjoyed our stay and didn’t want to leave! The river is fun to wade in, the area is so peaceful, the cabin was spotless, the bed comfortable, and the porch was a great spot to relax. I would recommend this to anyone. The hosts were very easy to communicate with and they even checked in to make sure we got there ok. Would definitely book again!

As advertised! The Riverside Retreat was the ideal lodging for a low key, comfortable getaway. It was very tidy, clean, and very well equipped. The deck, river and fire pit were highlights for me.
Pro tip: Visit Bickle Knob Observation Tower across the street at night for a spectacular dark sky view!

This is a very nice, clean cabin to stay in with relaxing views of the river. The Staurt Recreational Area is directly across the street, where you can access a few trails and picnic areas and the Otter Creek Trailhead and The Bickle Knob Obersvation Tower. We visited Seneca Rocks also. It's about 2.6 miles to hike to the top and back with an incline of about 800 ft. and switchbacks but the views from the observation platform are well worth it. There's also a place where you can ride horses to the top if you choose to go that route. Much like the trails we hiked, the roads to get there were up and down and curvy, which is to be expected in the mountains. We loved relaxing on the deck in mornings, hiking in the afternoons, and playing in the river and sitting by a fire right out back. Closest neighbors we saw were across the river and to the left so fairly private as well. Excellent communications from owners throughout the whole experience and thoughtful touches at the cabin too.

It is such a nice and quiet place for a short getaway. Both me and my husband enjoyed our stay, and our son got the chance to fish as he always wanted. The house is neat and clean, it is a great place to enjoy some family time together. Also, very easy communication with Andi and Billy.
Very relaxing getaway for my husband, myself, and our Golden Retriever who loved the waterfront cabin😊 We felt very at home and enjoyed the area😊Great host and first time Airbnb experience!
A wonderful cabin with every thing you could think of. We had such a relaxing time, and our 2 dogs had the best time in the river. We had some rain, but we didn’t let that damper our weekend.

Great little cabin for myself, hubby and 2 kids. Right in the water, kids could play and we didn’t have to worry about them because it’s not deep! They had tubes, water toys and plenty of room for the kids! Fire pit and back deck was one of are favorite spots! Quiet and secluded! Loved it!

Great setting right by the water. Tubes were provided, which provided some water fun. Very clean inside and many little amenities such as bottled water, soap, etc. We went hiking in Otter Creek Wilderness and Seneca Rocks. After those long days, the rental provided the ideal space for us to recuperate. The AC units in the main living area and bedroom were great. Always the perfect temperature. Plenty of cookware and dinnerware for our own meals. We all really enjoyed our stay.

Andi and Billy’s place is a pure oasis. It is right on the river so you can walk out and enjoy it anytime. They have a wonderful deck where we spent most of our time when we weren’t out doing other activities! The location was ideal for us. It was clean and comfortable:)
Wonderful cabin with an excellent location. So close to so much!

We wanted a quiet, peaceful retreat in a pretty natural setting. That’s what we got. Really nice. Coffee on the deck, watching the River in the morning, fire on the riverbank in the evening. The cabin is very nice and comfy and clean. Lots of great scenery and hiking in the region.

Loved our weekend stay at Andi & Billy’s cabin! The only downside was that we could not stay longer! The cabin was clean & spacious enough for 4 adults, a baby, and 2 big dogs. Having the river directly behind the cabin was fantastic! We are planning a trip back already!

The cabin is very well equipped and very clean. Having the river just feet from the back deck was awesome…too bad the weather was rainy on for us on Memorial Day weekend. We’ll definitely be back for another visit!

Such a great space. This was my first time staying in an Airbnb and I’m highly impressed. All the essentials were provided (linens, towels, cooking tools/utensils, etc.) Even silly things I didn’t remember to pack, like qtips & floss. It’s right on the water & so beautiful. The cabin was absolutely spotless when we arrived. Communication was incredible also, highly recommend.

Great place to stay close to area attractions. Cabin is somewhat close to the road but the way it is situated over the hill towards the river makes for plenty of privacy. The view of the clear water in the river is just awesome. We caught 15 trout on the weekend and got to enjoy a nice fire riverside. We waded the river behind the cabin and caught the biggest trout of the trip only to loose it after it jumped about two feet out of the water throwing the hook. Hopefully we’ll be back next spring.
Great place, great location! Everything you need for a perfect getaway!

This is a great location to be able to relax and fish right off the back of the property. Andi and Billy had the place extremely clean prior to arrival and even dropped off an extra tank of propane for the grill. Very close to some great hikes - both short and long hikes with some great views of West Virginia. Great stay and great hosts.
Best Air B&B I’ve stayed in, great place, clean, and has everything you need! Highly recommend.

We loved our stay! Beautiful views, cozy cabin, awesome outdoor space (campfire spot, picknick table, river access, idylic trickling stream next to property, deck overlooking the river,...)! The hosts have thought of literally anything that you could maybe need during your stay. We felt very welcome and right at home. The property is very clean and we appreciated the precautions taken of providing disinfecting products. Definitely recommend it for a relaxing getaway! I bet it is also stunning in the spring time when all the rhododendron surrounding the property are blooming - we might have to come back for that!
Beautiful spot right on the river. Was a cozy cabin and perfect for our outdoor adventures nearby
We really enjoyed our stay - very close to great places to hike/explore even in the winter. Would definitely consider returning!
Great location, great cabin, great hosts!
Wonderful cabin in a gorgeous location with stunning views. The snow made for an enchanting experience. Hosts were unbelievably helpful and quick to respond to any questions. Highly recommend!

My family had a wonderful time staying at the Riverside cabin. The view of the river from the back porch was really peaceful. The cabin was very clean and had all the little necessities that were needed. The bed was extremely comfortable and my kids enjoyed having their own bed to themselves with the 2 pull outs from the couches. We ate at the families restaurant Beanders and the food was delicious! It was a short drive into Elkins where we also enjoyed some drinks at Big Timber Brewing. The snow tubing in Canaan Valley was a BLAST! It is highly recommended for something fun to do and Blackwater Falls was beautiful. We look forward to returning. The hosts were very helpful to us and responded quickly to any questions we had. Thank you Andi and Billy for the memories.
Cute little cabin by the water. Clean and well equipped with everything we needed. Andi and Billy were very helpful. Would like to come back when it gets warmer and can float in the water.

Andi and Billy's place is in an amazing location in Monongahela National Forest! Andi and Billy were super communicative and ensured we got there safely and we available if anything was needed. The place was clean, stocked with all of the essentials needed and a great place to relax for the weekend. We would definitely come back and hope to in the Spring or Summer!

We had a wonderful holiday visit to Andi and Billy’s cabin! It was spotless and peaceful. Our kids from the Deep South loved playing in the snow and it was only a 30 minute drive to Canaan Valley for snow tubing. We would love to return!

Andi and Billy’s place was great- very much as described, rustic charm, beautifully located on the river near hiking trails, and very clean. We had some trouble with our 2wd on the driveway due to ice on the steep slope of the driveway, so would suggest at considering chains or 4wd if you plan to park near the house. Otherwise if you have 2wd, suggest parking on the road which is just a few feet above the house and very easily accessible. A lovely home for a weekend away!

Top notch! This cottage was beautifully clean, comfy and cozy! The dog loved it too! It was well equipped with everything you could possibly need-and more! Even dog treats :) We would absolutely stay here again!

If only I can rate more than 5 stars I would!!! Absolutely loved Andi and Billy's place in the mountains. It's so beautiful and quaint and in such a wonderful location. It was probably also the most comfortable bed I've ever laid on. We had to leave early to avoid a snow storm and absolutely heartbroken we couldn't stay longer. We'll definitely be back - hopefully when the time is right and when we can enjoy the river too. Thank you for your hospitality, Andi and Billy!
Fantastic location! Quaint and just enough of everything!
Wonderful place right on the water! We couldn't have been happier with our stay.
Such a nice getaway! Remote, relaxing, had exactly what we needed, great escape from the city!

Cozy cabin close to Elkins and all the attractions.
Fire pit, picnic table right beside river.
Couldn’t ask for a more peaceful location.
The Riverside Retreat was BEAUTIFUL! A perfect space for my husband and I to unplug during a crazy year. Will definitely return!
This cabin was everything we needed it to be and more! Great setup, awesome deck with gate to keep pups in, beautiful yard by the river, very relaxing stay. Beautiful setting!
Everything I could ask for was supplied. Thanks for that!

The Riverside Retreat was everything we could have asked for and more. The setting can't be beat - nestled in the woods with lots of privacy and the Shavers Fork river running through the backyard no more than 20ft from the house. Having the river so close was idyllic and so relaxing. We brought a camping hammock and set it up between two trees on the water's edge.
The house is perfectly sized (with a king bed to boot) for a couple. It was perfectly clean and well appointed not only with the essentials but plenty of other amenities and little touches to make for a great stay - inner tubes for the river, metal roasting sticks for marshmallows, bundles of wood available to purchase on an honor system, FAST internet, and A/C and heat in both rooms.
It's an 8 minute drive to Elkins if you need groceries or supplies and less than an hour's drive to many of the great hiking areas in Dolly Sods, etc. We can't wait to come back. Thanks!
Great cabin right next to the river. Little stock of firewood (and some kindling!) are available. Short drive to Elkins WV and not far from lots of scenic wilderness areas.
A comfortable home to use as your anding pad and adventure base. We enjoyed being here as much as we enjoyed exploring the local area.
Beautiful and serene location. Clean and comfortable cabin. A true gem!
This is a very nice and cozy place. My girlfriend and I spent a long weekend here and had a great time. We would definitely visit here again!

The cabin is clean, comfortable and cozy. The view from the deck is fabulous and the deck is enclosed making it nice for dogs too. The cabin is stocked with necessities you may need while there. The hosts were quick to respond and extremely helpful. We would highly recommend this cabin for anyone looking for a place to get away and enjoy some of West Virginia’s beautiful nature.

This little cabin right on the river is a gem for a couple looking for a quiet retreat. The deck and yard right on the river offer an outstanding setting for relaxation and contemplation. We spent lovely mornings and evenings there and then wonderful afternoons exploring and hiking many of the nearby wilderness areas. We loved clambering around Bear Heaven, catching a great view from the Bickle Knob tower, hiking the Otter Creek Trail, and visiting Seneca Rocks--all a very short and beautiful drive from the cabin. The cabin itself was very comfortable, well-stocked, attractive, and clean. Check-in and check-out went very smoothly. We look forward to going back there!

Wow! My husband and I often stay at Airbnbs and this was one of our favorites. We didnt leave the cabin except to run iut and get supplies, as we were socially distancing. The cabin itself was sparkling clean and full of cute, personal touches. Furniture was comfortable and cozy. The deck was amazing and our dog loved sitting out there with us to watch the river. We were near a road but felt far away from civilization. Our hosts were extremely helpful the days before we checked in, making sure we knew everything we needed to know in terms of what to bring with us, directions and how to check in. We brought some of the provided chairs down to the fire pit by the river two nights in a row just to relax. I would highly recommend this cabin. My husband and I were cautious as we have not travelled anywhere since the pandemic began. However, we were reassured once we arrived as the cabin was well stocked and very clean. Our hosts obviously put a lot of loving care into this home.
Lovely little cottage overlooking a serene water view. The deck was enclosed and allowed the dogs and humans to rest, relax and enjoy the view and sounds

We had a wonderful weekend getaway at the Riverside Retreat! We used the fire pit often to cook some meals and of course s'mores! The kitchen had everything we would ever need. The deck was our favorite spot to hang out, it was nice having the little gate so we could keep our 2 yr old and dog in one spot and still enjoy the outdoors! Great memories were made, and we hope to make it back soon.

A wonderful cabin within a stones throw to the waters of Shavers Fork. Perfect location for nature lovers with the added benefit for all dog families to bring their pup along for the adventure! We cannot wait to go back next year!!

We loved this retreat on the river! The location was amazing and the deck fronting the river was the best place to relax, grill, and just look at the beauty outside! The cabin had everything we needed and was very clean and organized. Location provided easy access to Elkins and the drive to Seneca Rocks, Black Mountain State Park, and other places is a beautiful one.

We spent a socially distanced vacation at this cozy, comfy, quiet cottage in a great location. There’s a huge deck right by the river which was only about a foot deep with crystal clear water, fun for wading and tubing (host supplied!). (Water level rises with rains.) Lovely view of mountains rising from the river. Comfortable bed, fluffy towels, good WiFi. House is shaded by trees and stayed cool even during a heatwave. Ten minute drive into Elkins for good takeout at several restaurants. National forest is across the road with some hiking trails and meadows, and nearby (quick drive) rail-to-trail for biking or hiking.

This was a great cabin right on the river, clean, quiet, perfect for relaxing. The hosts were very responsive and provided useful information about the local area. We're talking about coming back in the Fall!

Cabin was really nice. The river is prettier than we expected based on the photos - it's clear except for right after a big rainstorm and it's shallow (mostly like 2 ft. deep) so it was safe for kids to play around in. The bunk beds are pretty small - they were fine for my kids but I wouldn't plan to put teenagers or adults in them. Cabin is convenient to rt 33 and Elkins.

The back deck especially was our favorite part. Expect a 45 minute drive to Seneca Rocks and Blackwater Falls trail (many of the nature sites to see while there). We didn’t spend too much time in Elkins (the town) because we were more socially distancing.

The river is the main character in the story of this perfect little cabin in the woods. It peacefully glides by the cabin beckoning you to throw in a line to catch a trout or just sit on the deck to watch the ducks practice their water landings.
The creek that feeds into the river offers a soothing flow of water that offers a perfect backdrop for a good night's sleep in the comfortable bed.
If you choose to leave the hideaway, you can be among stores and restaurants in about 5 minutes where you can find everything you need.
The hosts are lovely and do not bother you while you stay in their little piece of paradise. We hope to return again someday.

What a great little “retreat”! Close enough to town for a quick supply run and you just can’t beat being right on the river for fishing/enjoying the water. Anne & Paul were super communicative and quick to respond to our questions and the place was well-appointed and more than I could ask for. If you’re looking at places in Monongahela, I highly recommend their place- I hope to go back soon!
Great view, close to town, and clean.

Wonderful cabin, fantastic amenities, and perfect location. Gorgeous views, but close enough to Elkins to make a quick pizza run. :)
What a gem of a place.

My husband I thoroughly enjoyed our visit at The River Retreat. Such an adorable place with a majestic view of the river. The deck is spectacular, even in the winter.
I highly recommend Anne and Paul’s retreat as it was spotlessly clean and so cozy and comfy. Can’t wait to go back.
Great place to stay! Very clean and well kept. Location is private with an amazing view of the river. Owners were always responsive and nice. Plan to stay again in the future.

This is such a quaint cottage by the river. The back porch is amazing to have a cup of coffee in the morning and listen to the day starting. Paul knows a lot about the area and is willing to help out with areas of interest. I would recommend that you call them prior to your stay to ensure the check in address. Because of the remote location and Google maps not keeping up with rural routes it is inaccurate. Speaking with them directly will ensure you will not get frustrated checking in on your first night. Cell coverage is spotty at best coming into the locations as well as at the location but that is ok you are going to LOVE it. Anne and Paul also have a great Internet connection you can still stay connected if you wish once there. I hope you enjoy it as much as we did!
Great location! Wonderful weekend! Beautiful area!
Great location! Conveniently located near everything Elkins has to offer. Thanks, Anne and Paul!

A wonderful summer retreat. We go on a small family vacation every year and picked this adorable cabin on Shavers Fork. The rental comes with everything that you could need for a pleasant day. The hosts are extremely courteous and responsive. The riverfront access is the best. Elkins is a short trip away and there are so many beautiful natural sites to see. I highly recommend staying at this cabin.
Great view, comfy cabin. Perfect rustic place to sit on the deck and watch the river go by.
Great place to stay! The back deck was our favorite part of the cabin, we also enjoyed a couple fires just feet from the river. We can’t wait to come back!

Anne and Paul where exceptional Hosts .. Very private.. Owners never bothered us .. fallowed up with our questions Quickly.. A B&B with out being in same house.. House Close to everything , be adventures We still have much too see .. WE ARE DEFINITELY GOING BACK.

Cool little cabin in an really amazing location. Hosts were very patient with us when asking for help with the final directions, and we're very warm and friendly. We would absolutely like to stay there again in the future. Book this cabin, you'll be glad you did.
Great place to stay. Neat cabin with super location. Extra comfy bed.
The place is not too far from Canaan Resort so it was perfect as a place to stay while we spent a long weekend skiing.

The cabin location is absolutely beautiful. We stayed in January. It was cold and snowy. I highly recommend 4 wheel drive in the winter. It was beautiful overlooking the river from the warmth of the cabin. Unfortunately, we weren't able to sit outside on the deck but will hopefully make it back in warmer weather to enjoy the river. The cabin is in the National Forest and also just a few minutes from downtown Elkins. Across the road from the cabin is the bickle observation tower that I highly recommend. You can drive to the top of the summit (though a pretty tough drive in the snow). Also, a friendly heads up that cell service for Verzion is pretty spotty in all of Elkins (or all of West Virginia for that matter). Cabin has WIFI though, so, very helpful for getting around. We have stayed in an airBNB in downtown Elkins previously but much preferred this cabin. Paul is a great host and I highly recommend this cabin.
The cabin is very cozy. It was plenty warm on the cold nights. It’s right in the river which was beautiful. Would definitely stay again.
A cute cabin right on the river. We were able to get to hiking areas on foot and within an easy drive of the cabin. It was in a good location.

This is a gem of a cabin located within feet of the Cheat River. The outdoor porch is awesome and offers great views of the river and easy access for water activities. The cabin is fully equipped and has all the amenities required for a comfortable stay. The location is very convenient and with easy access to Downtown Elkins. The Bickle Knob lookout which is just a short drive away, offers breathtaking 360 degree views of the Allegheny mountains and Monongahela forest! The dogs found it extremely comfortable and we loved our stay here! Overall, great vacation. - K & A

Cute, rustic cabin with all the essentials. Owners were great and the location is remote and private yet convenient to town. I was a little worried we’d be staying in the back yard of the owner’s when I read the listing but the cabin is separated from their residence a short drive down the mountain. It sits along the river and has a great deck. A warm and functional place to sleep for those who plan to venture out.
Nice place! Lots to do in the area! I would recommend doing as much this place very much.

Ann and Paul we're quick to respond to any question. They were lovely hosts and had an easy check in process. We were close to some great hiking locations and loved having access to a river in our backyard. Great stay!

Had a wonderful stay, felt right at home! The house had all the essentials you would need and was even better than the pictures! Very conveniently located being close to the college. Elizabeth was very responsive to any and all questions and accommodating going above and beyond to ensure I had a good stay. Elizabeth was an excellent host. I would highly recommend this place !
Perfect hub to see our daughter at D&E and enjoy the Forest Festival. Kitchen had everything we needed for the week. We would definitely book again!
The home was super cozy and relaxing! I was so happy to have the coffee bar available. Elizabeth was great to stay in contact and answer any questions! Will definitely be returning!!!

Lovely, well cared-for cottage very close to downtown. Has everything you need. We were a group of four friends and we’re comfortable staying for a week. Elizabeth is super easy to communicate with and very responsive. Highly recommend!

Great stay and very comfortable house. I was very happy to see basic cooking items (oil, salt, pepper) plus a good assortment of utensils and pots and pans so we could cook meals. It was also very nice to have a washer/dryer with supplies. Elizabeth was super easy to communicate with and very friendly in our text exchanges. I hope to stay here again when I’m visiting Elkins again next year!
the tuck away is sound proof. we heard nothing even though we were right in town. it was neat and clean. the kitchen is well stocked. it was accurately described
Perfect

The house was beautiful, clean and gave all the comforts of home. I was very happy to find a place close to our cabin for my in laws to enjoy. Our GPS did take us to another house several times, which is not the owners fault.
Elizabeth was great to work with and very accommodating. Home was very clean and well laid out and beautifully decorated!! It suited our needs perfectly!!
The house was charming and met all of our needs. We’ll be back again!
Very cozy. Elizabeth was great, she answered any and all questions. Highly recommended.

"We had a wonderful relaxing time at this site. Everything was readily available for cooking in if you wanted too and plenty of restaurants for dining out very near. Beds were cozy. Absolutely recommend! Thank you Elizabeth for thinking of everything!"

Elizabeth was an incredible host with communication and flexibility with our short stay. Tuck Away 2 is like a "warm hug" while traveling. Adorable and well stocked with all essentials and then some! We will be back and refer others to her as well.
This home was beyond our expectations. The beds were so comfortable!

We loved this place! So cozy, charming, & stylish. Great location & quiet neighborhood. Elizabeth is the best host & replied quickly to any ?s. We were sorry to leave & will stay here on future visits. You’ll be glad you book Tuck Away. Thanks!
Cozy little place. Felt at home right away. If I were in Elkins again, I’d stay here in a heart beat!
Great place to stay and wonderful communication.

Very cozy home, just a described. The location was perfect. Kitchen is well stocked including a few snacks on the table. Communication with Elizabeth was easy and excellent!! We will definitely be staying at this cute home again.

It was so sad to leave this truly perfect hub for my travels after 4 weeks here! Such a cozy little house. So well decorated, functionally designed and equipped with everything to make it a home rather than a hotel.
The neighborhood is very quiet and very walkable if you’re not venturing off to one of the state parks or forest area. I enjoyed walking into town to the restaurants, to the college campus which has beautiful grounds and to the city park. I even walked to Krogers one day (just under a mile) to pick up a couple of things. Walmart is also convenient - less than 3 miles away to stock your kitchen if you want to cook in.

My brother hit 'test' on the smoke detector, which then started to go off. Less than a minute later, we received a call from Vivint, the built-in home security system. We told them that we didn't need help, we were just testing the alarm and it went off, and that we were sorry. The Vivint security responders were very understanding and just wanted to make sure we were safe. My brother then jumped in and said we have every right to test the safety systems in a home that we are renting to ensure our safety. He hung up on us. We think they just found holes and damages in carpets at their other rental locations, then pinned the damages on us because they have on record we tested the smoke alarm. Their story just doesn't add up or even make any sense at all, not to mention they have absolutely no proof we did any of this. We do not appreciate being accused for damages we didn't do, and do not appreciate that these hosts are trying to scam us. Save yourself the headache and do NOT rent from these people.
